name: Dark Souls 2: Scholar of the First Sin

steps.0mymqf0v: Head through the gap in the wall, turn right and in to the hidden area beside the fallen tree to get the @rusted-coin
steps.f6e5a2hc: Enter the house and choose your name, class, starting gift and appearance
steps.at8az785: Go upstairs and get the @human-effigy from the chest
steps.yr8gq8r9: Go out the door beside the women, destroy the cart to get the @soul-of-a-lost-undead and @torch, and rest at the bonfire
steps.4gcm4xjx: Go back through the house and take the hidden path below the bridge to get the @small-smooth-silky-stone[Small Smooth and Silky Stone]
steps.mhjdoklc: Go back up, cross the bridge, through the bushes and kill the @ogre to get the @stone-ring
steps.7ihs4bwq: Return to the bonfire and continue to the tutorial section
steps.89xvvd8m: Go through the first fog gate, complete the section, getting the @dagger and @lifegem along the way
steps.kkysx5ro: Leave the @small-smooth-silky-stone[Small Smooth and Silky Stone] on the nest for @dyna-and-tillo[Sparkling Sisters Dyna and Tillo] to get a random item and kick down the ladder
steps.g6juwu2f: Drop off the ledge to get the @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier and drop down to the main path
steps.l4pvq03k: Go through the second fog gate and jump the gap to get the @amber-herb[Amber Herbs]
steps.u2fpw0q2: Jump back and go up the ladder, drop down and open the door to get the @cracked-red-eye-orb
steps.79w6anub: Drop down to the main area. There will be a third fog gate blocked by a petrified statue that can be removed with a @fragrant-branch-of-yore
steps.12m71c4n: Push down the tree, cross it, then drop down and get the @estus-flask-shard on a corpse in the pit
steps.grj1ym5t: Climb out and go through the fog gate, then kick down the other tree to the left for a shortcut
steps.pqww76e8: Kill the @bosses-the-persuer[Pursuer] that spawns on the beach
steps.jn3xo5ts: Optionally sleep in the coffin to change the sex of your character
steps.81ieqyev: Light all the sconces in the area for a Black Phantom to spawn
steps.edowpzlz: Go back to the house and talk to @housekeeper-milibeth to get the @handmaid-s-ladle
steps.b6skphqk: Head back to the tutorial section and continue on to @majula
steps.nlslshfv: On the way drop off to the right between the boulders to get @morning-star, @clerics-s-sacred-chime[Cleric's Sacred Chime] and @binoculars

steps.4o683w90: Rest at the bonfire and then talk to the @emerald-herald to get your @estus-flask and level up
steps.mbs4rrst: Go back up the path, pick up the @divine-blessing, head through the gap on the right and talk to @benhart-of-jugo
steps.bewrnjd0: Optionally kill him to get the @bluemoon-greatsword, and make @benhart-s-knight-helm[Benhart's Set] and @benhart-s-parma available to buy from @merchant-hag-melentia
steps.722b3n6p: Go in to the building, open the door on the left, kill the @goblin[Bloated Hollow] and get the @lloyd-s-talisman[Lloyd's Talismans]
steps.718nzv25: Return to the bonfire, go up the steps to talk to @saulden-the-crestfallen-warrior, learn the Welcome gesture and optionally join the @way-of-blue covenant to receive the Blue Seal ring
steps.38jovxiv: Optionally kill him to get the @ring-of-steel-protection
steps.lfw644us: Examine the plaque beside him to see how many deaths there have been
steps.9v6zzr0x: Talk to @blacksmith-lenigrast to find out why he's outside, and pick up the @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier and @lifegem[Lifegems] to the right of his house
steps.hguwlzbz: Head towards the pit and get the @lifegem from under the tent
steps.e6lhtxlk: Head down the steps to the right of the tent, go down the spiral staircase and get the @crimson-parma shield from the chest
steps.uh0x1avc: Go back up, up the hill to the Victor's Stone, pick up the @homeward-bone[Homeward Bones] and optionally join the @company-of-champions covenant if you're up for a harder challenge

5zgsnb4m.content: Enter the house to the right of the pit, talk to @sweet-shalquoir and buy anything you need from her

steps.gpodzdgl: @ring-of-the-evil-eye @ 4,500 souls (Absorb HP from each defeated foe)
steps.e617sm9l: @redeye-ring @ 6,700 souls (Easier to be detected by enemies)
steps.jvfr1c6h: @name-engraved-ring @ 5,500 souls (Easier to connect to players who chose the same god)
steps.vrp5k7ab: @ring-of-whispers @ 5,800 souls (Can hear the voices of foes)

steps.ogtwsb88: Later, when you kill @royal-rat-vanguard and @royal-rat-authority she will sell @flying-feline-boots for 6,000 souls, which reduce falling damage
steps.7vphd7dc: Go to the well to the right of the mansion and hit the stone to get the @estus-flask-shard
steps.p3hrev1t: Kill the three @enslaved-pig 12-20 times and they will turn into two @undead-boar. Kill these boars 12-20 times and they'll turn into a @giant-undead-boar. This boar drops three @cracked-red-eye-orb[Cracked Red Eye Orbs] and doesn't respawn

kwdork7n.content: Head to the house on the other side of the pit, talk to @maughlin-the-armorer and buy any shields or armor you need from him

ui2h5oo7.content: If you spend 1,000 souls with him he will sell

jiagulqk.content: If you spend 16,000 souls with him he will sell

steps.v2d7yxdv: If you spend 16,000 souls with him and talk to him with 0 soft souls he will give you the @aurous-set
steps.cryv8nij: He will will also sell boss armor later when you kill certain bosses
steps.b3m8mo9b: Go up the ladder beside @maughlin-the-armorer[Maughlin] and get the @titanite-shard from the chest
steps.zxee891h: Go back to the @emerald-herald and upgrade your @estus-flask
steps.4ep6n43d: Head down the path along the cliff, get the @rusted-coin from the chest in the first building, and pull the switch to open the gate
steps.wi8m0s76: Go through the gate and drop down to get the @human-effigy

steps.2cibs9wc: Take a right and go up the river to loot @homeward-bone and @soul-of-a-lost-undead from the corpse, then follow the river down until you reach the bonfire
steps.zr047m5h: Clear out the area, grab the @soul-of-a-lost-undead from the bottom of the river, and go up the ladder
steps.ajmepwkg: Go right, pick up the @green-blossom, and jump across to get the @throwing-knife[Throwing Knives] and the @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier, then head back up
steps.zieh4ajm: Climb the second ladder, get the @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier, and kill the @hollow-soldier[Firebomb Hollow]
steps.gidkv2uw: Jump the gap to get the @shortsword and the @soul-of-a-lost-undead
steps.v5xj1d8w: Drop down and clear the area, and pick up the @broken-straight-sword, @human-effigy, and @lifegem
steps.570ze31g: Go through the fog gate, go through the hole in the wall, clear the room and smash the cabinet to get the @wood-bolt[Wood Bolts]
steps.1blk4piz: Pick up the @lifegem in the corridor
steps.hnxzivwi: Run up the steps, watching out for the @hollow-soldier[Hollow] archer and firebomb thrower
steps.y0st9bpw: Get the @buckler, go up the ladder and pick up the @witching-urn
steps.jsm7ktim: Open the door and rest at the bonfire

h65dr8h1.content: Talk to @merchant-hag-melentia and buy useful stuff from her

steps.s7y2xdzr: Optionally kill her or spend 10,000 souls to get the @covetous-silver-serpent-ring[Covetous Silver Serpent Ring +1]
steps.eghmuk7g: Talk to her and exhaust her dialog so that she will move back to @majula soon
steps.aahwz7kj: Go upstairs and hit the door a few times to break it
steps.5up7f4u5: Kill the @crystal-lizard. Get the @small-leather-shield and @repair-powder from the chest, the @hand-axe and @radiant-lifegem[Radiant Lifegems] from behind the cart, and the @hollow-soldier-helm from a corpse
steps.fknqnf79: Open the other door, watch for the ambush by the @hollow-infantry, and get the @small-white-sign-soapstone and @radiant-lifegem[Radiant Lifegems] from the chest
steps.01db3ln7: Drop down on to the branch to get the @divine-blessing, and drop down again
steps.8zcr1ubu: Go back out the door you came in, drop down on to the scaffolding and jump the gap to get the @human-effigy
steps.xp6cx1mj: Make your way down the scaffolding and get the @soul-of-a-lost-undead and @torch from the branch near the bottom
steps.vlhj6r34: From the top of the tree, jump across the gap to get @prism-stone[Prism Stones] from the ledge
steps.ci684jpu: In the first cave get the @foot-soldier-shield
steps.hs9q1ceu: In the second cave get the @soul-of-a-proud-knight, quickly run further in to the door, and open it to get the @longsword[Fire Longsword]
steps.i238j4l8: Wait for the gap in the fireballs from the @flame-salamander and run back out of the cave
steps.p3predaq: Head back out and up towards the ladder, getting the @lifegem[Lifegems] to the left before going up, go through the hole in the wall and back to the bonfire

956uaxn8.content: Go back to @majula, open the door for @blacksmith-lenigrast, rest at the bonfire, and buy anything you need from him

steps.zbt2dnwq: If you spend 8,000 souls with him he will give you the @blacksmith-s-hammer
steps.n1o9wai6: Optionally, kill him to get the @blacksmith-s-hammer
steps.4n47d72h: Get the @short-bow from the chest behind him
steps.q7rdl9kh: Travel back to the @forest-of-fallen-giants[Forest of Fallen Giants / Cardinal Tower] bonfire, go down the ladder, across the bridge and get the @soul-of-a-lost-undead
steps.tcsqmnix: Optionally, if you bought the @silvercat-ring, kill the first @flame-salamander from range, drop down on to the rubble and kill the second salamander
steps.dn0beem8: If you dropped down, pick up the @hawk-ring, @firedrake-stone, @large-soul-of-a-proud-knight, and get the @flame-quartz-ring[Flame Quartz Ring +1] from the chest
steps.xazx2q41: If you dropped down, go in to the cave and get the @cracked-red-eye-orb[Cracked Red Eye Orbs], @heavy-iron-key, and the @rebel-s-greatshield, and go back to the bonfire and down the ladder again
steps.immf6seo: Go through the fog gate, up the branch, clear the @hollow-soldier[Hollows] at the top, and bait the firebomb thrower to destroy the wall and open the shortcut
steps.rhptr2uq: Go up the ladder to kill the @hollow-soldier[Firebomb Hollow], and try to kill the @the-pursuer[Pursuer] to get the @ring-of-blades and the @soul-of-the-pursuer. Loot the @estus-flask-shard, @repair-powder, @human-effigy, @lifegem[Lifegems], and a @torch
steps.eg40g1dl: Head back to the branch, jump down on the scaffolding and make your way to the cave on the left to pick up the @human-effigy
steps.vtqljxod: Talk to @cale-the-cartographer until he gives you the @house-key and talks about going back to @majula, and get the @amber-herb from the ledge
steps.i0habd1u: Optionally, kill him to get @cale-s-helm and make the rest of @cale-s-set available to buy from @merchant-hag-melentia
steps.imu6z2q5: Leave the cave, go up the ladder, kill the @hollow-soldier[Hollow Archer], drop down on to the roof, clear out the scaffolding, and drop down in to the tower to get the @torch
steps.qjsvvdur: Go back up on the scaffolding, jump across to the loft of the house, drop down and get the @titanite-shard from beside the gate, and head back to the bonfire
steps.ibumc3e3: Go through the hole in the wall, head left down the steps, and drop off to get the @green-blossom from beside the steps
steps.2ll0utpb: Run in and out of the room with the ballistas to avoid getting skewered and kill the @hollow-soldier[Hollows] that rush you
steps.pjr4hgv3: Pick up the @great-soul-arrow sorcery, @blue-wooden-shield and the @large-soul-of-a-lost-undead from the corpses
steps.cv4ae2re: Go down the ladder, open the trapped chest to get the @titanite-shard, and use the @pharros-lockstone to open the hidden door
steps.g01asosp: Get the @chloranthy-ring and @titanite-slab from the chests
steps.i0enqzk6: Knock on the wooden door by hitting it with your weapon, clear the room and get the @life-ring and the @large-titanite-shard from the chest
steps.3qgmw0kc: Go back up top, talk to @mild-mannered-pate and go through the gate that shuts behind you
steps.p1kq8eza: Clear out the first area, go in to the building and clear that out and pick up the @aromatic-ooze
steps.4gu32psa: Use the illusory wall on the right of the bottom of the stairs and get the @sorcerer-s-staff and @amber-herb from the chest
steps.0cwqcimm: Head up the stairs and drop down to @mild-mannered-pate[Pate] to get the @white-sign-soapstone
steps.k8gxvfsp: If you died go back to @mild-mannered-pate[Pate] and you will still get the @white-sign-soapstone. You can use the ladder on the other side of the wall to get back in if you want to
steps.qyu1ebrd: Optionally, kill him to get @pate-s-spear and the @ring-of-thorns, and make @pate-s-set and @pate-s-shield available to buy from @merchant-hag-melentia
steps.adtjfqdo: Go through the archway, get the @large-soul-of-a-lost-undead from behind the tree to the right, go up the ladder and get the @light-crossbow
steps.8gwte3ag: Go in to the building, kill the @invisible-hollow in a corner by the lit brazier, and jump across to the platform to get the @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier and @torch from the corpse
steps.o8g97coz: Drop down, get the @mail-breaker and @infantry-helm from the chest, and drop down outside
steps.yene415y: Go through the door, kill the two hollows guarding the fog gate, go through it and open the shortcut door on the left back to the bonfire
steps.vsp8zcg3: Pick up the @fire-arrow on the ledge, go in to the room, and get the @large-leather-shield and @lifegem from the steps
steps.42zpt8lx: Go back outside and pick up the @amber-herb[Amber Herbs] from the left, and the @lifegem and @homeward[Homeward Bone] from the platform on the right
steps.yomg5rg8: Go up the giant sword, watching out for the ambush from behind, and get the @halberd and the @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier

30pqoz3d.content: Go back inside, head down the elevator and kill the @the-last-giant[Last Giant] boss

steps.z4vad9ug: You can summon @mild-mannered-pate just outside the fog gate. If he survives he will give you @pate-s-set when you meet him in @earthen-peak. You can also summon @sellsword-luet here
steps.l78wnbrm: You will get the @soul-of-the-last-giant, the @soldier-key and 10,000 souls
steps.1mffm9gz: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 2,500 souls each time

steps.mri5rg05: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.hsdv9zjx: If you need @lifegem[Lifegems], @merchant-hag-melentia should now be there and will have an infinite supply at 300 souls each
steps.6apsmav0: Travel back to the @forest-of-fallen-giants[Forest of Fallen Giants / Cardinal Tower] bonfire
steps.y5hnue1w: Go back down the ladder, across the bridge and unlock the door to get the @ring-of-restoration and a @torch. There is also a @grand-lance in the King's Gate area
steps.e4j62w4u: Go back outside to the giant sword, turn right and unlock the door, go up the stairs and get the @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier and @lifegem from the platform

f46cd14d.content: If you didn't kill him earlier, go through the fog gate and kill the @the-pursuer[Pursuer] boss

steps.wj745u0d: You can summon @ruined-aflis in the dark corridor between the Cardinal Tower and Soldiers' Rest bonfires
steps.q2tojk1l: You can use the ballistas to quickly dispatch him. Be careful not to kill any players you summon
steps.5shw8mkd: You will get the @ring-of-blades, the @soul-of-the-pursuer and 17,000 souls
steps.0rrfpn4k: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 4,250 souls each time

steps.fd62unm3: Move on to the next area, drop down and get the @drangleic-set (minus the helmet), the @drangleic-sword and @drangleic-shield
steps.d8akoiwj: Drop down, make your way back up to the Pursuer boss area and examine the nest to get flown to the @the-lost-bastille[The Lost Bastille / The Tower Apart] bonfire. Open the chests containing a @dull-ember, and two @human-effigy[Human Effigies]
steps.93dncuyc: At this point we're going to do a quick bit of this level to get some good upgrade items and a useful bonfire
steps.7iipozid: Walk around the ledge of the building on the left and get the @radiant-lifegem and @large-titanite-shard from the corpse
steps.xdq5pstn: Drop down and get the @fragrant-branch-of-yore, @covetous-silver-serpent-ring, and @human-effigy from the chest. Kill the @bosses-the-persuer[Pursuer] that spawns
steps.fxcrmt56: Open the door, go up the ladder and along the walkway to the left, roll through the barrels and open the door
steps.iwdjyrbu: Talk to @lucatiel-of-mirrah until you have exhausted her dialog, pick up the @antiquated-key from the chest
steps.p44lf6pn: Optionally, kill her to get @lucatiel-s-mask and make the rest of @lucatiel-s-set available to buy from @merchant-hag-melentia
steps.z6xl204q: Go out the door, walk on to and along the wall on the right, go up the ladder and get the @large-titanite-shard from the corpse
steps.k0ioshzn: Go back out the same door, and continue along the walkway, getting the @gold-pine-resin from the corpse in the small alley on the left
steps.mlg1w9pg: Nudge the barrel so it rolls down and blows open a hole in the wall, go down and light the bonfire
steps.c6qvyhhi: Light your torch, go in to the room and get the @large-titanite-shard[Large Titanite Shards], @titanite-shard[Titanite Shards], @iron-arrow[Iron Arrows] and @heavy-bolt[Heavy Bolts] from the chests
steps.iy1q6uer: Talk to @steady-hand-mcduff and give him the @dull-ember, light the stationary torch in the room and rest at the bonfire again
steps.2w88iwbi: Go back in to the room and get the @craftsman-s-hammer and @twinkling-titanite from the chest he was sitting on

2nwen3ka.content: You can also talk to him and buy anything you need

steps.03gld60n: He can also infuse your weapons and shields if you have the required stones
steps.x5cx9fod: If you spend 14,000 souls on his services, not including buying stuff from him, he will give you a @titanite-slab
steps.dikf8xqw: Optionally, kill him to get a @titanite-slab
steps.9e04ry5h: Go back to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.czepgi53: If you killed @mild-mannered-pate you can now buy @pate-s-set from @merchant-hag-melentia
steps.6fv1tl3w: Open the door of the mansion, get the @pharros-lockstone from the library, and the @titanite-shard[Titanite Shards] and @torch from the chest upstairs
steps.8taesecc: Go down below the map room, kill the @skeleton and pick up the @human-effigy it drops, get the @estus-flask-shard and then the @soul-vessel from the chest
steps.mtm8g658: Go to the @emerald-herald and upgrade your @estus-flask
steps.a4vkb875: Travel back to the @forest-of-fallen-giants[Forest of Fallen Giants / Cardinal Tower] bonfire
steps.nqj2bzcy: Go down the ladder, pass the bridge, go through the archway, and open the door with the @soldier-key
steps.ld58x1y7: Head down the corridor, getting the @black-firebomb[Black Firebombs] and the @homeward[Homeward Bone] from the alcove to the left, and the @torch from the end
steps.wbcw57xa: Open the door, go in to the next building, go up the ladder and get the @whip, @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier, and @cracked-red-eye-orb[Cracked Red Eye Orbs]
steps.jw1yztv9: Also get the @bastard-sword from a corpse on the roof
steps.wf1c4jbx: Go outside and get the @amber-herb and @green-blossom from beside the immovable gate
steps.qyxca7lj: Go through the next building and get the @large-soul-of-a-proud-knight and @leather-set from the chest on the wooden structure
steps.gxxa6k9q: Prepare to be invaded by @armorer-dennis, but do not kill him if you think you may ever want to farm @seed-of-a-tree-of-giants
steps.3jtp7n82: Go inside the next building and light the bonfire
steps.s6mr9wcn: Go out and in to the second room of this building to find a sleeping giant, that has the chance to give a @seed-of-a-tree-of-giants if you get invaded
steps.9oghju9l: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.kssc5vdl: Go down the stone staircase towards @heide-s-tower-of-flame, picking up the @soul-of-a-lost-undead and @broken-thief-sword along the way

steps.glivzw0c: Kill the first @old-knight and light the first bonfire to the right of him
steps.04ueu3jt: Kill the second @old-knight[Knight], pick up the @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier and @human-effigy from the corpse
steps.ujard1gj: Kill the @old-knight[Knight] guarding the first switch, use it to raise the first platform, and get the @lloyd-s-talisman from behind the door
steps.jhep4567: Kill the first @old-knight[Knight] in the circular room, kill the two that will then rush you, and use the switch that appears to raise the second platform
steps.2alyorxn: Head out the right door, go down the steps and kill the @old-knight[Knight] guarding the fog door, and get the @green-blossom[Green Blossoms] and @ring-of-binding from the chests

ww2ak1jn.content: Go through the fog gate and kill the @dragonrider boss

steps.ydrp950r: You can summon @masterless-glencour just outside the fog gate
steps.i9rvuwho: Make sure you hit both switches before the fight so you don't have to worry about falling off
steps.e9lsskh4: You will get the @dragonrider-soul and 12,000 souls
steps.8xlusufd: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 3,000 souls each time

steps.qwg5okmf: The @heide-knight[Heide Knights] in the area will now be hostile

evqq7q4l.content: Go up the stairs, light the bonfire and anything you need from @licia-of-lindeldt

steps.56t3h4sl: Talk to @licia-of-lindeldt[Licia] until you exhaust her dialog so that she will return to @majula
steps.c6el3wg0: If you have at least 30 Faith she will give you the @saint-s-set and the @idol-s-chime
steps.rdsjt1c1: Optionally, kill her to get the @rotunda-lockstone and @idol-s-chime, and make the @saint-s-set available to buy from @merchant-hag-melentia
steps.eqlraw3x: Go back to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.751p6szb: While you are in @majula, go back down the stone stairs and talk to @licia-of-lindeldt[Licia], and pay the 2,000 souls to open up the path to @huntsman-s-copse
steps.xs3fvc6r: Get the @rouge-water and follow the path up to the bonfire

u8lwfntf.content: If you have at least 8 Faith and 8 Intelligence talk to @felkin-the-outcast and buy useful stuff from him

steps.4bs66vcu: If you have at least 20 Faith and 20 Intelligence talk to him to get the @hexer-s-set and @sunset-staff
steps.jxruwgvu: Optionally, kill him to get the @sunset-staff and make the @hexer-s-set available to buy from @merchant-hag-melentia
steps.vp1qja0g: Travel back to the @heide-s-tower-of-flame[Heide's Tower of Flame / Tower of Flame] bonfire
steps.ox9501p4: Make your way back up to the room with the three knights, go out the doorway on the right, and get the @divine-blessing from the ledge
steps.4j2qztr5: Kill the @guardian-dragon[Dragon] to get a @true[Petrified Dragon Bone], @watchdragon-parma, and reveal the switch. Use it to lower the drawbridge and walk up it
steps.v65ckbuo: Get the @old-radiant-lifegem from the corpse, and five @human-effigy[Human Effigies] from the chest

764mex5m.content: Go through the fog gate and kill the @old-dragonslayer boss

steps.n1bzvd53: There are no NPCs to summon for this fight
steps.lmriwg4s: You will get the @old-dragonslayer-soul, the @old-leo-ring and 15,000 souls
steps.ixzmof5b: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 3,750 souls each time

steps.dus9zzi1: Go out the door and get the @cracked-blue-eye-orb, @cleric-s-parma, and @tower-shield from the chests

jr65fh0h.content: If you have a @token-of-fidelity, talk to @blue-sentinel-targray and join the @blue-sentinels covenant to learn the Duel Bow gesture and buy anything you need from him

steps.ukinivin: Joining the covenant will also give you the @blue-seal[Guardian Seal] ring, which increases HP by 3%
steps.9eb3i73j: Optionally, kill him to get the @blue-knight-s-halberd and make @targray-s-set available to buy from @merchant-hag-melentia
steps.ehrn1dw4: Go down the stairs, light the bonfire, go back to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.pegrwesp: Go talk to @cale-the-cartographer who should now be in the map room in the mansion
steps.ycgt8wy8: Travel back to the @heide-s-tower-of-flame[Heide's Tower of Flame / Tower of Flame] bonfire, head towards the door and down the spiral staircase, picking up the @monastery-charm at the bottom
steps.c0z2rzvl: Get the @human-effigy, @torch[Dark Torches], @soul-of-a-proud-knight, and @old-knight-halberd from the corpses on the upper level
steps.yw17zmqr: Go down the stairs and get the @sublime-bone-dust from the chest guarded by the @data-sir-syan-kings-loyal-knight[Syan Knight]
steps.xo8dp005: Take the elevator down, you will need a @fragrant-branch-of-yore to get access to the stairs so that you can get the @knight-set from the chest upstairs, as well as an @estus-flask-shard
steps.vveg1jks: Go out the hole in the wall and the lower level and follow the path to the bonfire

steps.tslan3mz: Light the Unseen Path to Heide Bonfire, there will be various torches and braziers in the next area that you can light if you wish
steps.s439nv0l: Head out to the wharf, optionally summon @bradley-of-the-old-guard, whose sign is on the docks, if you wish
steps.wz5uyutl: Get the @titanite-shard from the chest in the first house, and the @soul-of-a-proud-knight from the balcony, and move on to the next set of houses
steps.94h6upup: Pick up the @large-soul-of-a-lost-undead and @lifegem from the water, the @dark-pine-resin from the left house, and the @iron-arrow[Iron Arrows] from the right house
steps.mingbpd4: There is a non-hostile torch-wielding hollow in the far right house who can accompany you through the entire level if you are short on torches
steps.biuu71r9: Go up the first set of stairs, turn right and get the @bandit-axe and @brigand-set from the first chest in the house
steps.53ucnz38: Clear out the @varangian-sailor[Hollow Varangians] from the upper floor and get the @repair-powder and @titanite-shard from the second chest
steps.9aatwqfd: Go back downstairs and use a @pharros-lockstone to light up the area
steps.jowehtkg: Drop down on to the roof and get the @large-soul-of-a-proud-knight and @small-smooth-silky-stone[Small Smooth and Silky Stone] from the corpse
steps.vbtpa9ni: Go back to the stairs, but this time go left into the house. Go upstairs and talk to @lucatiel-of-mirrah and exhaust her dialogue, during which she will give you a @human-effigy. Optionally, kill her to get @lucatiel-s-mask and make the rest of her set available to buy from @merchant-hag-melentia
steps.mha14sbw: Destroy the shelves next to the doorway to find 3 @human-effigy[Human Effigies] on a body
steps.pphaothu: Continue through and head up the next set of stairs further ahead and get the @large-soul-of-a-lost-undead and @emit-force miracle from the corpse
steps.dqlten2l: Head through the giant hole in the wall and clear out the @dark-stalker[Darkdwellers], and get the @greatsword from the metal chest, and the 2 @silver-talisman[Silver Talismans] from the trapped chest on the right
steps.snqmgo8a: Go back outside, go upstairs in the next house, and continue outside to ring the bell to call the ship
steps.w2gpqni1: Drop down on the roof to get the @lifegem and @homeward[Homeward Bone] from the corpse
steps.maz2mj1b: Drop down again, go inside the house and get the @fire-arrow from the stairs, continue outside, and walk down to the next level
steps.49mtx4e9: Turn left, go in to the house and get the @throwing-knife[Throwing Knives] and @flame-butterfly[Flame Butterflies] from the corpse behind the poison urns
steps.ozjqbzqb: Get the @fragrant-branch-of-yore from the chest, smash the wall and kill the @crystal-lizard
steps.rhown1ez: Pick up the @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier, @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier, @lifegem[Lifegems], and @fading-soul from around the cave, and the @royal-soldier-s-ring from the chest
steps.itgey99i: Go in to the next house, use the illusory wall and get the @firebomb[Firebombs] and @large-titanite-shard from the chests, and go upstairs to open the shortcut gate

5w9f1nup.content: Talk to @lonesome-gavlan and buy useful stuff from him

steps.3tv9y4nr: Sell any items you won't need to him to get some more souls
steps.zplodhex: Optionally, kill him to get the @gyrm-greataxe
steps.6vae7cqi: Head back down and outside, and get the @human-effigy and @lifegem[Lifegems] from the corpse on the boat
steps.zjjjftkr: Kill the two @hollow-soldier[Hollows] hanging on to the walkway, and the one in the water before they ambush you

ayb4jlgs.content: If you have at least 8 Intelligence, go right along the walkway, talk to @carhillion-of-the-fold and buy anything you need from him

steps.4wpr3qta: If you have at least 30 Intelligence, talk to him to get the @northern-ritual-band[Northern Ritual Band +1] ring
steps.f4mcqgk6: Optionally, kill him to get the @northern-ritual-band[Northern Ritual Band +1] ring
steps.jrfd4mf0: From Carhillion, go back down the docks and turn left to kick down a shortcut to the bonfire

w3kqw4f5.content: Head to the ship, go downstairs, through the fog gate and kill the @flexile-sentry boss

steps.erkjdyit: You can summon @lucatiel-of-mirrah from the dock
steps.19uq0o1m: This is the first of at least three boss fights you need to summon her for and have her survive to complete her quest
steps.0yo9vu73: You can also summon @bradley-of-the-old-guard near the archer on the dock
steps.nfu1gdyr: You will get the @flexile-sentry-soul and 14,000 souls
steps.qynlgj6q: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 3,500 souls each time

steps.z2mf7geu: Go up the ladder, get the @pyromancy-flame and @fireball Pyromancy from the chest, and examine the compass to take a one-way trip to the next level
steps.tr68dqmx: Go in to the cave, up in the elevator, quickly run over the elevator switch and out of the cage, and jump on top of it as it goes down
steps.lc9bbqgr: When it gets near the bottom walk through the hole on the door side and get the @scimitar and @repair-powder from the hidden cave
steps.17n2jrht: Go back up in the elevator, get the @soul-of-a-proud-knight and @radiant-lifegem from the corpse in the cell
steps.9zcn0stk: Go up the stairs, get the @common-fruit from the third cell on the right, and rest at the bonfire in the fifth cell on the left
steps.t31zn8nf: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.qxft5e3j: If you talked to @carhillion-of-the-fold earlier then he will now be beside the dead tree on the left of the hill

steps.v5oa2mkc: Get 13,400 souls and buy the @silvercat-ring from @sweet-shalquoir. If you can't afford it you can come back here later
steps.jm8on862: Get naked and drop down on to the first set of logs in the pit to get a @radiant-lifegem
steps.tyriyrd2: Drop down on to the second set of logs to get a @pharros-lockstone
steps.uhlvlyx4: Drop down again and then do a running jump across to get the @poison-moss[Poison Mosses]
steps.5215etrh: Drop down on to the ledge, go inside and use the bonfire to return to @majula
steps.szpa982r: Drop down again 4 times to where you picked up the @poison-moss[Poison Mosses], but this time drop down to the next set of logs instead of the ledge
steps.0n9gxvve: Keep dropping down until you get the @ring-of-the-evil-eye[Ring of the Evil Eye +1] and then put your gear back on
steps.1vpvay0v: Use a @homeward[Homeward Bone] to return to @majula and then travel to the @grave-of-saints[Grave of Saints / Harval's Resting Place] bonfire
steps.zesugby9: If you are online then keep alert because you can be called to invade members of the @rat-king-covenant while you are in this area
steps.gjz8bd2v: Go in to the circular room and get the @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier from the corpse
steps.p458yrhj: Go up the steps and to the left to get the @small-smooth-silky-stone[Small Smooth and Silky Stones]
steps.hxese6g3: Use a @pharros-lockstone to lower the bridge near the top of steps, go across and get the @poison-moss[Poison Mosses]
steps.84l5qhkz: Go up the stairs and get the @whisper-of-despair Hex and @torch
steps.za9n6wcx: Go back across the bridge, turn left and go up the ladder near the end, turn left at the top and get the @homeward[Homeward Bones] in the room at the end
steps.33fg317h: Head back towards the ladder and light the bonfire passed it on the right

vqzk199g.content: Go through the fog gate and kill the @royal-rat-vanguard boss

steps.7int6f5k: There are no NPCs to summon for this fight
steps.d6ah27fh: After killing 10 of the normal rats the boss will show up. He's the one with the mohawk hair style
steps.tgjyr3nv: You will get the @rat-tail[Royal Rat Tail], the @royal-rat-vanguard-soul and 11,000 souls

o0t1tn90.content: Go talk to @the-rat-king and buy anything you need from him

steps.v3w2mmyy: Optionally, you can join the @rat-king-covenant to try and earn some more @pharros-lockstone[Pharros Lockstones]
steps.n4mc3mct: Continue on, drop down the hole and pick up the @pharros-lockstone
steps.ggd2tg60: Drop down the coffins on to the walkway, and get the @bleed-stone from the corpse at the end
steps.u5i1z8tr: If you've got the nerve, jump across and get the @disc-chime from the small ledge
steps.2h4w801t: Drop or jump to the bridge and kill the @crystal-lizard, then jump across the gap and get the @ash-knuckle-ring from the chest
steps.ewldvk8c: Drop down and be prepared to kill the @undead-citizen[Exploding Undead Citizens], then get the @sublime-bone-dust from the blocked tunnel, @great-heal and @homeward[Homeward Bones] can be found on skeletons
steps.xavmkggp: Go out the other tunnel, make your way down the ladders to the right and get the @human-effigy
steps.66hqd69o: Continue down the ladders, getting the @radiant-lifegem on the way, and get the @token-of-spite from the chest at the bottom
steps.k4kvrqvq: Head out the tunnel, watching out for the poison statues, drop down on the first roof, watch for the collapsing floor, then drop down to the bonfire
steps.pty743ek: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.6geynhhw: Travel to the @the-lost-bastille[The Lost Bastille / Exile Holding Cells] bonfire

steps.ap0bskph: Drop down in to the gap in the walkway and go around the ledge to get the @soul-of-a-brave-warrior and @human-effigy
steps.x7209nuh: Drop off the wall and smash the wooden structure to get an @alluring-skull
steps.oe70rjvd: The @bosses-the-persuer[Pursuer] will attack you in this courtyard at some point, check back periodically
steps.17u72kbd: Go down the alley on the left and get the @estus-flask-shard and @large-titanite-shard from the chest
steps.xxubzt8e: Go back to where you dropped off the wall, smash the planks covering the hole in the wall and get the @flame-butterfly[Flame Butterflies] from the cell
steps.eqk6ankt: Open the door with the @antiquated-key, hit the block on the well, kill the three @undead-citizen[Undead Citizens], and get the @wanderer-set from one of their corpses
steps.w6jijre1: Go down the alleyway, up the ladder, clear the room, go up the next ladder and get the @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier and @green-blossom
steps.4wju0spm: Climb down, back outside and up the first ladder again
steps.5zdm2sr5: Use a @firebomb to explode the barrels and get the @archdrake-robes and @archdrake-shield, and move in to the next room
steps.g2wb8ydo: Open up the chests to get the @parrying-dagger, @twinblade and @bone-staff
steps.wak5a34f: Use a @pharros-lockstone and get the @soul-vessel from the chest in the hidden room it reveals
steps.t2hcknov: In the next room, grab the @wilted-dusk-herb, then go up in the cage elevator and get the @skeptic-s-spice from the corpse
steps.b7alk80d: Drop down on to the ledge in the elevator shaft to get the @bonfire-ascetic, drop down again and go back up in the elevator
steps.oobq4c3f: Open the door, and if you already have a @fragrant-branch-of-yore you can go upstairs, talk to @straid-of-olaphis and light his bonfire
steps.t58zhtlc: If you want to skip most of @the-lost-bastille you can open the gate and continue on to @sinner-s-rise
steps.4729kou3: Go downstairs, into the alcove beside the cage, open the secret door in front of you, loot the @green-blossom, then open the second secret door on the left
steps.oaaax2ex: Go outside and deal with the @bosses-the-persuer[Pursuer] that will spawn again, head forward to pick up the @bracing-knuckle-ring, then jump across the gap near the hidden wall and pick up the @flame-butterfly and @torch
steps.jhqv1olq: Follow the ledge to get the @soul-of-a-brave-warrior and @golden-wing-shield, drop down, and walk down the steps to the bonfire
steps.9ctoozns: Go back up the stairs, cross the stone rubble on the right, unpetrify the statue with a @fragrant-branch-of-yore, open the door, and deal with the ambush
steps.v8qmf12a: Head downstairs, open the shortcut door, and get the @soul-of-a-proud-knight and @human-effigy from the corpse
steps.3ic3c2r1: Go up the ladders and get the @radiant-lifegem from the corpse in the open cell

u2xejnp6.content: Go through the fog gate and kill the @ruin-sentinels boss

steps.1kp9czlq: You can summon @pilgrim-bellclaire from the open cell before the fog gate
steps.wmai5goz: You can also summon @felicia-the-brave from the room prior to the Ruin Sentinels passage
steps.xsozl1ss: You will get the @ruin-sentinel-soul and 33,000 souls
steps.pq2tmrnh: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 8,250 souls each time

steps.xaz31tex: After the fight, open the four hidden doors in the boss room and get the @target-shield and @rusted-coin
steps.3mgun2p9: Go up the ladder in one of the rooms to get the @hush Sorcery from the chest, open the hidden door and get the @homeward[Homeward Bone] from the ledge
steps.27uv71ef: Go out the door, up the stairs, open the hidden door, watch out for the @undead-citizen and get the @rouge-water from the chest
steps.83ydtkpj: Continue on, watching for the exploding @undead-citizen in the narrow passageway, get the @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier and light the bonfire
steps.csclcy16: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.mxlm3485: Travel back to @the-lost-bastille[The Lost Bastille / Servants' Quarters] bonfire
steps.5t585bes: Go up the steps, along the passageway, open the door and get the @bastille-key from the corpse at the edge on the left
steps.67s40e6e: Go in to the tower and through the door on the left, go through the gap in the wall on to the roof and get the @flame-butterfly[Flame Butterflies] from the corpse
steps.fyj3bf5f: Jump across to the other roof, get the @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier, go up the ladder, through the barrel room, down the staircase  and back to the bonfire
steps.96159dph: Go down the ladder, take care of the @bosses-the-persuer[Pursuer], get the @priest-s-chime from the chest, and the @large-club from the corpse
steps.ugps33ak: Use a @pharros-lockstone to open the hidden door and head in to @belfry-luna
steps.ahcmk8bh: If you are online then keep alert because you can be invaded here by members of the @bell-keepers covenant
steps.0hgfuf30: Talk to the @belfry-guard and optionally join the @bell-keepers covenant to try and earn some @titanite-chunk[Titanite Chunks]
steps.yz89kit2: Go up to next floor, get the @skeptic-s-spice from the corpse on the railing
steps.skktynkm: Drop down the hole in the floor and get the @blue-tearstone-ring from the chest, the @skeptic-s-spice from the corpse, and go up to the top floor
steps.x824cs5b: Go up the ladder and get the @radiant-lifegem[Radiant Lifegems] and @twilight-herb[Twilight Herbs] from the chest, and @skeptic-s-spice from the corpse
steps.4tf17jwp: Pull the lever to ring the bell and go back down the ladder

47e0d25i.content: Go through the fog gate and kill the @belfry-gargoyles boss

steps.my4d4ba1: You can summon @masterless-glencour from his sign under the second staircase
steps.xj49ystm: You will get the @belfry-gargoyle-soul and 25,000 souls
steps.63swm9yf: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 6,250 souls each time

steps.x4gatgsv: Get the @soul-of-a-proud-knight from the edge of the roof
steps.7bg2x5mm: Go out the door, down the staircase, get the @southern-ritual-band from the chest, go out the door and light the bonfire
steps.a24d1adn: Go down the ladder beside the bonfire and be ready for a tough ambush by dogs and the red phantom @vorgol-the-sinner
steps.ayj76ky5: Pick up the @dragon-tooth, @petrified-something, @brightbug, and @falchion[Enchanted Falchion], and go back up the ladder
steps.owl3ls30: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.u20k71qx: Travel to the @huntsman-s-copse[Huntsman's Copse / Undead Refuge] bonfire

steps.13947uyx: Remember that @felkin-the-outcast is just beside the bonfire if you need to buy anything from him
steps.nlobttar: Make your way up the path and kill the @great-moth before it poisons you
steps.9e24l2ue: Keep moving ahead towards the building, stay on the ledge when you get inside and deal with the door ambush at the end
steps.gkmetn7w: Go out the door, get the @cracked-red-eye-orb[Cracked Red Eye Orbs], climb down the ladder, light the bonfire and push down the tree shortcut
steps.fybst820: Go up the ladder and make the difficult jump across to the pillar to get the @pharros-lockstone and @token-of-fidelity
steps.hb7qqqpb: Drop down to the lower ledge, go in to the cavern, kill the @great-moth[Great Moths], and get the @monastery-charm and @soul-of-a-proud-knight from the corpse
steps.1jl39vm8: Drop down the mushrooms, get the @poison-moss on the second one, and get @ricard-s-rapier from the chest at the bottom
steps.i5xxiue9: Open the hidden door, go through the tunnel, get the @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier, and go up in the cage elevator
steps.o255rr7a: Continue on and open the next hidden door to return to the main building
steps.lbxk5eyz: Go down in to the lower area, and get the @bandit-s-knife, @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier and @lifegem from the corpses
steps.5lmjbewt: Go up the ladder on to the roof, drop down to the ledge to get the @poison-moss[Poison Mosses] and @lifegem, drop down again and return to the bonfire
steps.mdkylfsx: Continue in to the copse, and get the @large-soul-of-a-lost-undead and @small-orange-burr from the corpse to the left of the first bridge
steps.77cyvttj: Go over the bridge and get the @lifegem, @aromatic-ooze, @morning-star and @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier from the area on the left
steps.lkr88bde: Continue up the hill, drop down through the roof of the hut and get the @sublime-bone-dust from the chest, @soul-spear Sorcery, @poison-moss, and @green-blossom
steps.g717h48k: Go back up the hill and in to the next hut, watching for the ambush from above, and pull the lever to lower the bridge
steps.fltohjzg: Head across the bridge, go over the smaller bridge, and continue along the ledge until you get to a path leading up to the left
steps.t9n7b9el: Go up the path and get the @poison-throwing-knife[Poison Throwing Knives]
steps.1d81xyvk: Pick up the @undead-lockaway-key, and prepare to be invaded by @merciless-roenna
steps.9frnnvpc: Drop down on a ledge to pick up a @flamberge, return to the bridge, open the door of the hut, and light the bonfire
steps.92sjafbb: Talk to @creighton-the-wanderer and learn the Fist Pump gesture
steps.vko9ygch: Optionally, kill him to get @creighton-s-steel-mask, and make the rest of @creighton-s-set available to buy from @merchant-hag-melentia
steps.3qfe6gwr: In the next cave area remember that the skeletons respawn until you kill the @necromancer and the pots inflict curse until you destroy them
steps.0jpc2m28: Go in to the cave beside the hut, get the @mace[Magic Mace] and @titanite-shard, and kill the @necromancer in the next room
steps.tk7jr4lw: Go out the other tunnel, cross the small wooden bridge and continue along the ledge to the right
steps.b6fmjwv3: Grab the @flame-butterfly[Flame Butterflies] from the building and continue on, watching out for the @necromancer from across the chasm. You can kill it from here if you have range, otherwise you'll have to come up from behind
steps.dkt7plg2: Don't go through the fog gate yet, instead continue along the ledge into the cave and stay to the right to kill the @necromancer if you haven't already
steps.fat0z9ji: The corpse here holds the @combustion Pyromancy and a @titanite-shard
steps.sqpni2z8: Go back in and, if you are feeling brave, jump across to the middle section to pick up a @human-effigy, 40 @lacerating-arrow, and 3 @prism-stone[Prism Stones]
steps.fsd9bkhe: Head through the tunnel and kill the @crystal-lizard, pull the lever to open the shortcut gate, and pick up the @estus-flask-shard, then return to the fog gate

2oddb0pw.content: Go through the fog gate and kill the @skeleton-lords boss

steps.xw8s25si: You can summon @creighton-the-wanderer from his sign near the lever
steps.efeqlu6b: As you kill each Lord, several enemies will spawn after several seconds
steps.uu17hg14: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 3,750 souls each time

steps.8gjdyixu: Go out the new passageway, lower the bridge, continue on and light the bonfire in the cave, remembering about the poison at the entrance

6hmf3xon.content: Leave the cave, talk to @stone-trader-chloanne and buy useful stuff from her

steps.rxcn3htn: Exhaust her dialog so that she returns to @majula
steps.glzpu1d2: If you spend 20,000 souls with her she will give you two @twinkling-titanite
steps.cqwju7rt: Optionally, kill her to get a @palestone
steps.cvl6i4e0: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.4jp40wdj: If you talk to @saulden-the-crestfallen-warrior he should give you a @soul-vessel. If not, come back to talk to him later
steps.xr3x2h1f: Travel to the @huntsman-s-copse[Huntsman's Copse / Undead Lockaway] bonfire
steps.dtdnaf3t: Go back across the large bridge, drop down to the left and cross the smaller stone bridge
steps.fslh6wel: Go up the hill, get the @notched-whip and continue through the passageway on the left
steps.g9ukmjbp: Make your way forward, watching out for the four enemies that will drop down and try to ambush you
steps.mnvcd414: Cross the bridge, watching out for the gaps, and kill red phantom that blocks the way
steps.4f2z11zz: Jump across to the platform to get the @fire-seed

j54qu4dq.content: Go through the fog gate and kill the @executioner-s-chariot boss

steps.q5yhl5na: There are no NPCs to summon for this fight
steps.nsq2wq34: Use @alluring-skull[Alluring Skulls] to distract the skeletons while you kill the @necromancer[Necromancers]
steps.rxaxt0pk: You will get the @executioner-s-chariot-soul and 19,000 souls
steps.0qn03pto: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 4,750 souls each time

steps.auzvn8io: Pick up the @soul-of-a-brave-warrior and @fading-soul[Fading Souls] scattered around the area, the go upstairs and light the bonfire

nmcrmdkm.content: If you have a @token-of-spite, talk to @titchy-gren if you want to join the @brotherhood-of-blood covenant and be able to buy stuff from him

steps.wjviivm1: Once you have killed the @skeleton-lords he will sell the @bone-king-set (18,600 souls)
steps.gogx5s1t: Once you have killed the @executioner-s-chariot and been to @drangleic-castle he will sell the @executioner-set (25,100 souls)
steps.po0xunfc: Optionally, kill him to get @nahr-alma-hood, and make the @nahr-alma-robes and @scythe-of-nahr-alma available to buy from @merchant-hag-melentia
steps.bc8dnlwv: If you joined the covenant you can use the statues in front of him to duel other @brotherhood-of-blood members
steps.iitguqn4: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.n5o3fcy5: Remember to burn the @sublime-bone-dust to strengthen your @estus-flask
steps.usc8mx1i: Travel to the @harvest-valley[Harvest Valley / Poison Pool] bonfire

steps.dthfxjo4: Make sure you have some @poison-moss or lots of @lifegem[Lifegems] to deal with the poison in this level
steps.1uox8v88: Head down in to the valley and get the @lifegem from the corpse
steps.a5jy9l78: Pick up the @fading-soul[Fading Souls], @titanite-shard[Titanite Shards], @small-smooth-silky-stone[Small Smooth and Silky Stones], @titanite-chunk[Titanite Chunks], @poison-throwing-knife[Poison Throwing Knives], @torch[Torches], @sunlight-medal, and @lifegem from the first area
steps.ods4jyiv: Go through the hole in to the second area and get the @fragrant-branch-of-yore and @torch from the corpse
steps.qlcbjihe: Drop down in to the poison mist and get the @fire-seed and @divine-blessing from the chest
steps.rtcuyb69: Go back up, in to the cave, get the @raw-stone from the chest, and buy anything you need from @lonesome-gavlan
steps.ud7rncj2: Head back out and in to the next area, getting the @torch on the way, go up the first ladder and get the @hexing-urn[Hexing Urns]
steps.wi1u1tvd: Go back down, up the second ladder, pull the lever to open the gate, go through and to the right to light the bonfire
steps.l3gxt6z2: Continue to the next area, kill the three @crystal-lizard[Crystal Lizards], take the passageway to the left, and go in to the right to face the ambush by the @artificial-undead
steps.xfhqjmkm: Get the @green-blossom[Green Blossoms] from the corpse and then go around smashing the planks and picking up the items
steps.gskf00hn: You will get @lifegem[Lifegems], @simpleton-s-spice, a @titanite-shard, a @large-titanite-shard, a @large-soul-of-a-brave-warrior, a @radiant-lifegem and @skeptic-s-spice
steps.cjpaqxn8: Go through the tunnel on the upper level, turn left and kill the @crystal-lizard but do not drop down in to the mist
steps.88i44jqx: Double back, get the @titanite-shard and @petrified-something and drop down to the main area
steps.of4h52tj: Go back up the same way, wait for the @mounted-overseer to smash through the planks, and bait him in to smashing the planks behind him
steps.8oniipnu: Pick up the @soul-of-a-lost-undead, @old-knight-pike, @old-knight-greatshield, @torch, @radiant-lifegem and @smooth-silky-stone[Smooth and Silky Stone]
steps.v3ujryla: Leave the cave, drop down to the right and get the @poison-stone and @rotten-pine-resin[Rotten Pine Resins] from the chest
steps.2iskeqr6: Climb down the ladder in to the poison mist, go straight ahead, pick up the @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier and climb up the next ladder
steps.cw0u69rj: Drop down the smallest hole without the ladder and get the @fading-soul
steps.0fccjezs: Continue forward and to the right, pick up the @simpleton-s-spice, and go up the ramp to the right at the end
steps.vxibyhgz: Drop down in to the mist and get the @human-effigy, @large-titanite-shard, @titanite-shard, @soul-of-a-brave-warrior, the @chameleon Sorcery, and @washing-pole
steps.43pwkifs: Go across the bridge, up the steps and turn left before entering the building, and continue forward through the tunnels
steps.6qgwy2yw: Examine the statue to learn the Praise the Sun gesture and optionally join the @heirs-of-the-sun covenant
steps.llslwj0y: Take a moment to gaze at the sun!
steps.t9zqhqi5: Go back and in to the building, watching out for the @undead-steelworker that will ambush you through the poison pots
steps.pb0cu58s: Continue forward and up the steps to the fog gate, and drop down the gap beside the wooden planks to get the @skeptic-s-spice
steps.auf28d32: Jump across to the ledge of the cage room and go down the passageway, watching out for the arrow trap that fires from behind you
steps.9w0ny5dv: Get the @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier and @titanite-shard[Titanite Shards] from the corpse
steps.d0dltzkq: Get the @heavy-crossbow[Heavy Crossbow +3] and the @heavy-bolt[Heavy Bolts] from the chest, head back out and jump across to the steps
steps.ilgxcvcq: Go down the steps in to the poison, go straight down the passageway, turn right in to the room and talk to @lucatiel-of-mirrah to get the @ring-of-steel-protection[Ring of Steel Protection +1]
steps.nakcd80p: Use a @pharros-lockstone and get the @poisonbite-ring and @soul-of-a-proud-knight from the chest in the hidden room
steps.g6qvz4hu: Go back in to the poison, turn right and get the @repair-powder from the end, and then go all the way back to the fog gate
steps.8e931x8l: Go in to the side room and get the @torch from the trapped chest

b92pocsa.content: Go through the fog gate and kill the @covetous-demon boss

steps.jytx7fzo: There are no NPCs to summon for this fight
steps.ukaxubrf: You can use @iron-arrow[Iron Arrows] or @heavy-bolt[Heavy Bolts] to shoot down the pots to release enemies to distract the boss
steps.axewiz1n: You will get the @covetous-demon-soul and 13,000 souls
steps.ewz8viyz: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 3,250 souls each time

steps.hcbp4t96: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.6ftkq12l: Now that you have a couple of @fragrant-branch-of-yore[Fragrant Branches of Yore] you can take care of a couple of things

d48p776u.content: If you want some boss soul weapons then you need to go and free @straid-of-olaphis

steps.vkvvib07: Travel to the @the-lost-bastille[The Lost Bastille / Servants' Quarters] bonfire
steps.edofxmtu: Go up the steps, across the wooden bridge, up the spiral staircase in the tower and through the barrel room
steps.x2k1pugz: Go in to the room with the big pots, and keep going up the stairs until you get to him
steps.kz3u8nyv: Don't forget to light the bonfire to make it easy to get back here

ywmpxyuf.content: Learn the Mock gesture from him and buy anything you need

steps.lr4s5lrw: Trade in your boss souls for any weapons or spells that you want
steps.2pnmdult: Optionally, kill him to get the @black-hood, and make the rest of the @black-set available to buy from @merchant-hag-melentia
steps.vuar51bs: Unlock the cell beside him with the @bastille-key to get the @petrified-dragon-bone and @firebomb[Firebombs]

7afg341d.content: If you want to reinforce your @pyromancy-flames or buy some more Pyromancies then you need to go and free @rosabeth-of-melfia

steps.ed4i80ee: Go back to where you met @benhart-of-jugo, go inside the building and use a @fragrant-branch-of-yore to free her
steps.r8az99qu: Do not use the switch yet because it will trigger an ambush

6w3shpml.content: Talk to her to get a @prism-stone and buy anything you need from her

steps.gt5v6mxr: If you have any @fire-seed[Fire Seeds] she can reinforce your @pyromancy-flames
steps.11tduqhs: Optionally, kill her to get a @fire-seed
steps.tfuz5sja: It is advised at this point to get her back to @majula before using the switch
steps.vyxlk3r1: Exhaust her dialogue, give her at least one item of clothing and return to the @majula bonfire and rest at it. She should now be up on the hill
steps.6wsrnlmg: Travel back to the @earthen-peak[Earthen Peak / Lower Earthen Peak] bonfire

steps.at0o2hjp: Continue onwards and up the stairs, and get the @radiant-lifegem from the corpse
steps.ol8b5wpy: Go across the walkway, watching for the archers to your right, turn right and follow the path to the chest to get the @pike
steps.k59izlh7: Head back the way you came and up the ladder, go through the fog gate, light the bonfire and then light your torch
steps.k2h880fi: Burn the windmill to drain poison from some keys areas in this level
steps.3nzm14hn: Go up the stairs, pick up the @black-firebomb[Black Firebombs], watch for the arrow trap that fires towards you, and get the @manikin-mask
steps.oh795p6j: The gate is likely closed so climb up the ladder and head right towards the archer, picking up the @flame-butterfly along the way
steps.g3gslerz: Drop down the hole, break the poison vases, and continue through the lowest level until you reach the lever to open the gate
steps.m3eaalry: Break the fence and walk along the ledge to the left, and talk to @laddersmith-gilligan
steps.fzir6d6q: You can pay him 2,000 souls to lower a ladder so you can get a @pharros-lockstone and @twinkling-titanite from the ledge

vwr5ek0w.content: Talk to him to learn the Prostration gesture and buy stuff from him

steps.exhi2km8: Optionally, kill him to get the @melu-scimitar and @ladder-miniature
steps.gmadtawe: Go back along the ledge to get a @simpleton-s-spice
steps.yi5n15ys: Pull the lever and quickly get the @large-soul-of-a-proud-knight and @divine-blessing from underneath and climb up the ladder
steps.ej4q3yj3: Pull the lever again and ride the platform up, and get the @mirrah-shield from the chest
steps.uzthi1gy: Drop down, go up the ladder, follow the passageway, head down in to the room on the right and talk to @mild-mannered-pate
steps.cqm6fxmu: Go back up and continue up the steps to get a @pharros-lockstone from the trapped chest
steps.amg5pm5j: Go back down, go straight ahead and try the difficult jump to get the @radiant-lifegem, and a @soul-of-a-brave-warrior and @crimson-water from the chest
steps.8yesp5fs: Jump back, drop down on to the platform below, get the @great-heavy-soul-arrow Sorcery from the chest, go through the door and talk to @mild-mannered-pate[Pate] again
steps.cgt4ro67: Go back out the door, drop down to the platform on the right, and get the @lightning-spear Miracle from the chest
steps.chlks2nq: Get a good running jump across to the other walkway and get the @broadsword[Poisonous Broadsword] and @human-effigy from the corpse
steps.6kqqsooh: Jump across to the next walkway where you opened the chest earlier, and make your way back to the bonfire
steps.4jjuxxig: Go up the stairs, past the arrow trap, and take the ladder up to the next level. There will be an illusory wall past some poison pots, behind of which is a @spell-quartz-ring[Spell Quartz Ring +1]. Then, continue down the hall
steps.l438esdv: Make your way along, ignoring the fog gate for now, go up the steps and clear the room on the right, and get the @small-smooth-silky-stone[Small Smooth and Silky Stone] from the corpse
steps.qi3ibu0f: Don't waste a @pharros-lockstone but do kill the @mimic, and get the @dark-gauntlets and @work-hook
steps.kxwfpy9y: Go upstairs and left along the ledge, open the hidden door and get the @petrified-something from the chest
steps.2l9hfmjp: Go along the ledge in the other direction, open the hidden door and light the hidden bonfire
steps.8e9x8pln: Head down to the fog gate and pick up the @poison-stone to the left of the steps

gzyccjo5.content: Go through the fog gate and kill the @mytha-the-baneful-queen boss

steps.h4ajvgfj: You can summon @jester-thomas to the right of the steps
steps.tdj9ac1w: You can also summon @devotee-scarlett just past the very first bridge
steps.5ff3t5pe: Make sure you set fire to the windmill earlier or this fight will be multiple times harder
steps.9nj7vdh5: You will get the @mytha-the-baneful-queen-soul and 20,000 souls
steps.mi8uy0dw: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 5,000 souls each time

steps.mm23js4l: Continue through the new door, go up in the elevator to enter the @iron-keep, and light the bonfire down the steps to the left
steps.o5kh6hyp: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need

bigzwv1f.content: If you still need the ladders to get down the pit go talk to @laddersmith-gilligan

steps.nwg3p5z9: If you buy the long ladder and talk to him he will give you the @melu-scimitar

steps.ox0z5bfa: Travel to @the-gutter[The Gutter / Upper Gutter] bonfire

dy73giej.content: There are a few things to note while making your way through this area

steps.3uhsvper: It is much easier if you carry a torch at all times and light all the sconces for better visibility, to know where you've been, and to spawn the @gutter-denizen invader later in the area
steps.12osaezg: Make sure you have some @poison-moss or lots of @lifegem[Lifegems] to deal with the poison in this level
steps.4x18hmcn: Smashing the @poison-shooting-statue uses weapon durability, so bring a second weapon or @repair-powder with you
steps.wp5xx68m: The steps below assume you don't fall through a collapsible floor unless stated
steps.rf94xgnw: There are multiple branching paths in this area, so it's easy to get lost or turned around. Stay calm, there's always a way back

steps.7t5ijg3q: Before crossing the first bridge, break the pot to the left to get the @dung-pie[Dung Pies]
steps.s46gtr45: Cross the bridge, watch out for the collapsing floor in the middle of the platform, then cross the next bridge
steps.4cb5f4sx: Cross the next bridge to the right, go up the ramp and drop down to the dirt area below, being mindful of the @coal-tar[Grippers] that pop out of the tar pools
steps.jf4spign: Drop off the edge farthest from where you came from and towards the wooden structure
steps.lw0eazdk: Clear out the area on the ground level, climb up the ladder on the side of the structure, jump across to the ledge, and get the @ring-of-soul-protection from the chest
steps.lsm3khcw: Jump from the ledge back in to the wooden structure to get the @dark-armor and @winged-spear[Lightning Winged Spear] from the mimic
steps.4b9ehjdc: Go back up the ladder, jump across to the ledge and light the sconce at the other end to get @melinda-the-butcher to invade you
steps.ai9dmkbj: Drop down off the ledge, drop down again at the other edge, and head back towards the bonfire, getting the @lifegem from the pot along the way
steps.xs470z4e: Go back across the first bridge, drop down through the collapsing floor, taking care of the ambush when you drop
steps.91twsznc: Take a running rump across to the platform with the torch wielding @undead-citizen
steps.chynjcgb: Later, when you get the @forgotten-key in @black-gulch, come back here and go up the ladder to get @havel-s-set and @havel-s-greatshield
steps.sxd2097a: Go across the bridge, drop down the hole, get the @dark-pyromancy-flame and @rotten-pine-resin[Rotten Pine Resins] from the pot, and watch out for the @hunting-dog[Swollen Mongrel] in the next room
steps.rcg1mf5e: Go up two ladders and get the @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier from the pot, as well as a @fragrant-branch-of-yore, @twinkling-titanite, @human-effigy, and @smooth-silky-stone[Smooth and Silky Stones]
steps.g4fpzrul: Drop down and cross the first rope bridge
steps.57bewxav: On the other side of the bridge, go up the ladder and get the @black-firebomb[Black Firebombs] from the chest
steps.l3pdvcoa: Go down the ladder and drop down twice on the same structure and get the @titanite-chunk from the pot
steps.3tepsvz7: Drop down in to the next structure and get the @tattered-cloth-set[Tattered Set] from the pot
steps.mtgo60ma: Jump across to the dirt ledge and kill the Heide Knight for the @heide-knight-iron-mask and the @heide-lance, then open the chest to get the @aurous-set
steps.d27383o3: Go up the very long ladder, pick up the @estus-flask-shard, and get the @soul-of-a-proud-knight and the @bandit-greataxe from the pot
steps.cvptz2se: Go to the separate platform where several hollows are, then drop down twice to find @flame-butterfly[Flame Butterflies] inside a pot
steps.qfwgme2j: Keep dropping down until you end up on the same level as the rope bridge
steps.hd2cqvyv: Head across the planks to kill the @hunting-dog[Swollen Mongrel], and climb the ladder to the start of the second rope bridge
steps.qoa3fuc9: Cross the bridge, watching for the exploding @undead-citizen, and avoid the collapsing floor in the middle of the platform
steps.elm7fght: Cross the third rope bridge and go into the cave to get the @wicked-eye-greatshield from the chest
steps.bc71egy8: Leave the cave, drop down to the left, go into the cave with the non-hostile @corrosive-ant-queen, and get the @poison-moss from the pot
steps.9xw4bmmq: Go through the fog gate, watch out for the holes in the floor, smash the wooden wall on the far side, and light the bonfire
steps.64cl1y85: Head around the corner, break all of the poison statues, and jump across the gap to the other structure
steps.cwbb15ea: Kill the @hunting-dog[Swollen Mongrel], break the pots for @black-firebomb[Black Firebombs], then jump back across the gap
steps.5iboy6qk: Go back through the wall you smashed and down the ladder in the far left corner of the room, next to a pot with @dung-pie[Dung Pies]
steps.0c4s8h82: Drop down, get the @rotten-pine-resin[Rotten Pine Resins] from the pot, drop down two more dirt ledges and get the @great-club from the chest
steps.86ake61m: If you light all the torch sconces in the gutter, the @gutter-denizen will invade you, and will drop pieces of the @black-witch-set
steps.eczrfxge: Get the @dark-fog Hex, @torch, and @lifegem[Lifegems] from pots in the area
steps.sv92l82a: Use a ranged weapon, spell or consumable to destroy the corrosive pots in front of the hole in the wall, drop down and get the @fragrant-branch-of-yore
steps.o2vz4q65: Go through the fog gate into @black-gulch and light the bonfire in the cave to the left
steps.xic54368: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.qyjvh8fd: Travel to the @black-gulch[Black Gulch / Black Gulch Mouth] bonfire

ws3eqtws.content: As with @the-gutter there are a couple things to note while making your way through this area

steps.5z9nifra: Make sure you have some @poison-moss or lots of @lifegem[Lifegems] to deal with the poison in this level
steps.da6mlcry: Smashing the @poison-shooting-statue uses weapon durability, so bring a second weapon or @repair-powder with you
steps.f336ukky: Watch out for the @coal-tar[Grippers] that will pop out of the pools of poison and try to grab you
steps.zamwyg2p: Also watch out for the two @razorback-nightcrawler[Razorback Nightcrawlers] that pop out of the holes on the left as you go down the hill

steps.1c137uxo: Leave the cave and just after the rock that juts out on the left wall drop down on the right to the ledge and follow the path around to find @lucatiel-of-mirrah
steps.gvqnejsv: Exhaust her dialogue and drop down out of the tunnel, then go right and into the cave to get the @shotel and @great-magic-weapon sorcery from the chest
steps.pkyi34l7: Get the @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier, @scraps-of-life Hex, and @torch from the corpse beside the first @razorback-nightcrawler
steps.hqz3imhv: Continue down and deal with the invader @woodland-child-gully
steps.hlestr1e: Get the @radiant-lifegem from the pot and head to the cave on the left to get a @divine-blessing from the chest which, despite its appearance, is NOT a mimic
steps.m7pczpkn: Go to the cliff edge and follow it around to another cave with a bonfire, unpetrify the statue to access it, light it and get the @pharros-lockstone from the jar
steps.9izf5oy6: Go back out, follow the cliff edge back up the hill, and drop off beside the @razorback-nightcrawler[Nightcrawler] to a ledge with a door you can't open yet
steps.04vq44g4: Drop off to a smaller ledge, and then once more to the ledge leading in to a large cave
steps.o4g3e9c8: Go in to the cave, hug the right wall and go in to the second smaller cave
steps.tt56pjh2: Open the chest and get the @ring-of-giants[Ring of Giants +1] and @petrified-dragon-bone
steps.gl39xb02: Kill the two @elite-giant to get the @forgotten-key and @soul-of-a-giant
steps.xi2y5kjs: Go back to the first of the smaller caves, circle around the right to get the @silver-talisman[Silver Talismans] from the pot, circle back around and go up in the cage elevator
steps.0vy4irja: Go back up and drop down again to the first ledge with the door, open it and go talk to @darkdiver-grandahl
steps.g1vls1rr: Optionally, kill him to get the @dragon-chime
steps.w2ktbhgm: This is the first of three locations where you need to talk to him to be able to join the @pilgrims-of-dark covenant
steps.enf6hncj: Drop down and use the cage elevator again to get back to the bonfire
steps.jnf3umty: Head toward the fog gate and prepare to be invaded by @woodland-child-victor

pa0ch6sz.content: Go through the fog gate and kill @the-rotten boss

steps.c226qoj5: You can summon @lucatiel-of-mirrah beside the bonfire
steps.0lbda0qt: This is the second of at least three boss fights you need to summon her for and have her survive to complete her quest
steps.ol04lm23: You can also summon @lone-hunter-schmidt near the tar pits just past the first bonfire
steps.ymbfwx6k: You can also summon @bashful-ray near the @razorback-nightcrawler[Nightcrawlers]
steps.ivqipk6z: You can chop off his right arm so that he can no longer use his cleaver, making the fight easier from that point on
steps.ejf6l9it: You can chop off his left arm to get a @pharros-lockstone from a corpse in the cave after the fight
steps.6wpiwzmz: You will get the @soul-of-the-rotten and 47,000 souls
steps.a8hdmejc: This is one of four boss souls needed to open the door to the @shrine-of-winter
steps.o14pkied: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 11,750 souls each time

steps.esiaixxt: If you have enough fire defense and/or healing you can jump or run across the fire to get a @fire-seed
steps.i0iqd3na: Go out the tunnel, get the @sublime-bone-dust[Petrified Something], @simpleton-s-spice, and @skeptic-s-spice from the chest in the cave to the right, and go light the primal bonfire
steps.adrte3jy: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.rl3v8ksd: If you haven't already, buy the 12,000 ladder from @laddersmith-gilligan, talk to him to get the @melu-scimitar and slide down the ladder
steps.qs845i41: Go up the other ladder, open the door and get the @dragon-talon[Dragon's Talon], @soul-vortex Sorcery, @witchtree-branch, @witchtree-bellvine and @great-lightning-spear Miracle
steps.elgt9yaw: Go back to the bonfire and travel to the @the-gutter[The Gutter / Upper Gutter] bonfire
steps.x0bep8uk: Go and get @havel-s-set and @havel-s-greatshield as described earlier in #the-gutter section, and return to the bonfire
steps.jts74bu7: Travel to the @iron-keep[Iron Keep / Threshold Bridge] bonfire

steps.he9u4se1: If you have enough fire defense and/or healing you can run under the steps to get the @human-effigy
steps.izp3xzz3: Also, you can get a @bonfire-ascetic from jumping off the bridge and crossing the platforms
steps.kg8ijoyr: Go across the bridge and open the door, you will get invaded by several npc phantoms
steps.8yvmz67c: Once inside the building, head up the stairs and if you have enough fire defense and/or healing you can run under the fire and get the @iron-key

srn3f6qt.content: Head back down and through the hallway to talk to @magerold-of-lanafir and buy anything you need from him

steps.aoc4445e: If you have any @skeptic-s-spice or @simpleton-s-spice he can also incense your spells to lower their Intelligence or Faith requirements
steps.z55ma6ic: Later, once you have the @petrified-egg from @dragon-shrine, you can talk to him to join the @dragon-remnants covenant
steps.khe5lfvo: Optionally, kill him or spend 10,000 souls to get the @covetous-gold-serpent-ring[Covetous Gold Serpent Ring +1]
steps.0eirry94: Go upstairs, get the @pharros-lockstone to the left and open the hidden door to the right
steps.atoubgwi: Get the @fire-arrow from the corpse, open the next hidden door in front of the ballista and head in to the next area
steps.6q901n2w: Use ranged attacks to take out the @alonne-knight archer to the right, head along the walkway and drop down to pull the first lever
steps.ilt81uh5: Go up the steps, head to the right, drop down and get the @soul-of-a-proud-knight and @repair-powder
steps.3yd0wowb: Climb up the ladder and get the @life-ring[Life Ring +1] and @twinkling-titanite from the chest, drop down and head back to the bridge
steps.5blqrxae: Go across the bridge, jump across to the pillar and get the @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier and @red-leech-troches from the corpse
steps.v684f5wm: Drop down, pull the second lever, drop to the steps and go up to turn off the fire in the furnace
steps.lvigfbcp: If you have enough fire defense and/or healing you can go to the bottom of the steps and get the @phoenix-parma from the chest
steps.lt1nc5wr: Go in to the furnace and get the @large-titanite-shard[Large Titanite Shards] and @petrified-dragon-bone from the corpse
steps.4850cleu: Go through the other door and back across the bridge
steps.kom5vmz8: Make the tricky jump down on to the steps and get the @petrified-dragon-bone, go up the ladder, don't waste a @pharros-lockstone, get the @zweihander from the chest, and drop down

33lmqvlo.content: Make your way to the fog gate and kill @smelter-demon boss

steps.b0pagp63: You can summon @lucatiel-of-mirrah outside the fog gate
steps.96f86xbz: This is the third of at least three boss fights you need to summon her for and have her survive to complete her quest
steps.krah96ka: You will get the @smelter-demon-soul and 32,000 souls
steps.qx60zg38: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 8,000 souls each time

steps.bc0fggxw: Go out the door, up the steps and get the @porcine-shield and @flame-butterfly[Flame Butterflies] from the chest, and light the bonfire
steps.nxvems8f: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.pptstge2: You can now buy the @smelter-demon-set from @maughlin-the-armorer if you've spent at least 1,000 souls with him
steps.cgedmzjy: Travel back to the @iron-keep[Iron Keep / Ironhearth Hall] bonfire
steps.fwf7fe3k: Go back down to the boss room and kill @the-pursuer to get the @ring-of-blades[Ring of Blades +1] and return to the bonfire
steps.9jncvzwl: Go out the door, down the ladder and get the @old-radiant-lifegem and @green-blossom from the corpse, and go back up the ladder
steps.4f6bb245: Go across the the bridge, jumping the gap if needed, and pull the lever to lower the platform to the lava
steps.88dabukx: Open the door, use a @pharros-lockstone, open the hidden door and go up the ladder to get the @thunder-quartz-ring[Thunder Quartz Ring +1] from the chest
steps.n68zmb9k: Make the one way drop down to the bonfire and light it
steps.vitk3bgn: Head up the ladder, talk to the @belfry-guard and optionally join the @bell-keepers covenant to try and earn some @titanite-chunk[Titanite Chunks]
steps.t3ig2iwn: If you are online then keep alert because you can be invaded in the next area by members of the @bell-keepers covenant
steps.2j8hb2jp: Go through the fog gate, clear out the area, pull the lever to ring the bell and get the @simpleton-s-spice from the side of the tower
steps.8zyz0683: Go up the ladder, clear out the roof top and get the @simpleton-s-spice from beside the railing
steps.gvp3jtc6: Go down the roof, get the @simpleton-s-spice from the corpse and the @immolation Pyromancy from the chest
steps.10qile4f: Go down the steps and get the @human-effigy and @triclops-snake-troches from the corpse
steps.jv7cc2j2: Go out on to the ledge and open the hidden door to the right before you drop down
steps.9eldnqww: Get the @black-knight-greatsword, @protective-chime and @grand-spirit-tree-shield from the chests
steps.4pag23di: Drop down, pull the lever again and take out the @alonne-knight archers in the area
steps.hcpllbd4: Go up and then down the steps, kill the @crystal-lizard and go along the walkway watching out for the lava button traps
steps.4tpf961n: Get the @large-soul-of-a-proud-knight and @radiant-lifegem from the corpse
steps.mw3fi8tk: If you have enough fire defense and/or healing you can get the @fire-seed from below the steps and the @chaos-storm Pyromancy from the chest
steps.d4n6dymp: Go back up on to the platforms, making sure to stick to the edges, and pick up the @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier
steps.rz59n7q8: Go up the ladder and deal with the invader @oliver-the-collector
steps.aqj3brx8: Head up the steps and along the walkway, get the @destructive-greatarrow from the chest, and climb up the ladder
steps.yw3ga89i: Don't waste a @pharros-lockstone but do kill the three @alonne-knight archers
steps.teirxh0g: Get the @titanite-shard[Titanite Shards], @fire-arrow, and @simpleton-s-spice from the corpses, and @black-knight-greataxe from the chest
steps.h9xja1ap: Drop down on to the third walkway below to get the @cracked-red-eye-orb and @torch from the corpse
steps.f5e1zzjv: Keep dropping down, eventually dropping on to the rim of the pot to get the @covetous-gold-serpent-ring and kill the @alonne-knight
steps.gpir4gps: Go out the fog gate and get the @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier and @monastery-charm from the corpse and then come back in
steps.0wqjz9k2: Go down the steps, through the passageway, killing the two @ironclad-soldier and continue to the fire trap room
steps.zcwb3n76: Avoiding the fire, go to the corner of the room, up the two ladders, use the switch to turn off the fire and then light the bonfire
steps.woaf3hs3: Go back down the stairs, get the @short-bow[Lightning Short Bow +1] and head outside

ewodyc3q.content: Head in to the fog gate and kill the @old-iron-king boss

steps.4wki9jmb: You can summon @manhunter-o-harrah in the hallway filled with fire statues
steps.uftnl1zg: You will get the @old-iron-king-soul and 48,000 souls
steps.umbxdi13: This is one of four boss souls needed to open the door to the @shrine-of-winter
steps.rl4pfkys: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 12,000 souls each time

steps.0vry4tv5: Go in to the building, get the @petrified-something from the chest and light the primal bonfire
steps.z3urg50v: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.09zmzhmj: If you didn't get it earlier, travel back to the @iron-keep[Iron Keep / Threshold Bridge] bonfire and get the @iron-key
steps.52iglfb3: Go back to where you met @benhart-of-jugo, talk to him to learn the Joy gesture, pull the lever and deal with the ambush
steps.zhi3j6td: In the next room, open the door on the right and get the @estus-flask-shard from the chest, and open the door on the left to find the bonfire
steps.lc9u8j41: Make a quick return trip back to @majula to upgrade your @estus-flask

steps.s27phsuj: Go up the steps and jump across to the left side to get a @soul-of-a-proud-knight and @human-effigy from the second room
steps.za2tnlhm: Drop down and pull the switch beside the door you came in to open both doors and let you continue
steps.ud1u4fy3: Head down the path, getting the @fading-soul from the corpse
steps.qwbwh1lw: When you get to the start of the stone walls, go up on the left side to get a @pharros-lockstone
steps.8rysivvh: Grab the @soul-of-a-proud-knight and @human-effigy from the middle of a group of enemies, then continue on to light the next bonfire
steps.w9djd909: Make a quick run out the middle door, deal with the @ogre, and get the @red-tearstone-ring from the water and then return to the bonfire
steps.5wa4rj6n: Head out the right door into the mist, watching out the for the invisible @rogue[Rogues] in the area
steps.ed9vr7b7: Hug the right wall to get @lloyd-s-talisman[Lloyd's Talismans] and then further on the @old-sun-ring from a chest
