steps.zgu5xye8: Follow the cliff and then the wall to find a ramp that leads to a chest with a @chloranthy-ring[Chloranthy Ring +1]
steps.ru85cozq: Drop down and keep following the wall, ignoring the first hill going up to the right shortly after the chest
steps.5b1v1qfy: Go up the next hill to get the @soul-of-a-proud-knight and @human-effigy from the corpse
steps.ukoevazy: Go up the hill a bit more to find a broken structure, with a @fire-seed behind the wall and a head to talk to

9m6tta6r.content: Talk to the @head-of-vengarl, learn the Decapitate gesture and buy anything you need from him

steps.y5bcdo6v: Keep talking to him until he gives you @vengarl-s-helm
steps.ry0wmre2: Later, when you defeat @vengarl-s-body[Body of Vengarl], he will sell the @red-rust-sword, @red-rust-scimitar and @red-rust-shield
steps.s0mvjkfu: Go back down and go straight to find a corpse with a @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier and @radiant-lifegem
steps.1q7r5rry: The other items are in the middle of the mist and it's hard to describe where to find them
steps.xwaiglqv: Explore the middle carefully to get a @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier and @amber-herb[Amber Herbs] from corpses, and the @clear-bluestone-ring[Clear Bluestone Ring +1] from a chest near the @old-sun-ring chest
steps.2euxt5fr: Go back to the hill beside the chest on the ramp that you ignored earlier, go up it and in to the building, and light the bonfire
steps.ieb2xlho: Head up the ramp and get the @radiant-lifegem from the corpse and then drop down
steps.0rkwro09: Go down the ramp in front of you on the left, get the @magic-bolt from the chest and go back up
steps.hb80q6vh: Move forward in to the ruins, up the ramp, and jump back onto the level with the curse pot to get a @petrified-dragon-bone from the chest
steps.k13ezsa5: Go back up and all the way to the left and get a @flame-butterfly and @torch[Torches] from a corpse near the trees
steps.lpj0qybm: Go into the building with many curse pots and head downstairs to get a @soul-of-a-brave-warrior and @pharros-lockstone
steps.ovrza4dn: Go out the door, kill the @crystal-lizard and get the @dark-scythe from the chest
steps.ouqs6obl: Go down in to the sand, put on the @ring-of-whispers and talk to @manscorpion-tark
steps.t3s6rczi: Go down the passageway and use a @fragrant-branch-of-yore on the petrified @lion-clan-warrior[Lion Warrior] to loot a @torch and kill the @vengarl-s-body[Body of Vengarl] to receive @vengarl-s-armor, @vengarl-s-gloves, and @vengarl-s-boots
steps.qolcf9ts: Drop down the cliff and talk to @head-of-vengarl whose inventory has now been expanded
steps.awm4o5gq: Return to the bonfire and head back through the ruin until you reach the open area
steps.xq0ebs96: In the ruins to the left are several curse pots and a petrified @lion-clan-warrior[Lion Warrior] blocking a chest that contains @human-effigy[Human Effigies], @bleeding-serum[Bleeding Serums] and the @repair sorcery, but wait until you are done with this level to use a @fragrant-branch-of-yore so that you don't run out
steps.o7gxfe4l: Head into the next set of ruins with the giant barrels and deal with the three @lion-clan-warrior[Lion Warriors], then head up the stairs and loot the @pharros-lockstone and @soul-of-a-brave-warrior
steps.6jjvsbho: Get the @lifegem from beside the dirt-covered collapsing pit trap
steps.b7rkcg7y: Go in to the second tower and all the way to the top to talk to @creighton-the-wanderer and get the @skeptic-s-spice and @soul-of-a-brave-warrior from the corpse
steps.wcibmvg7: Head into the ruins to find another petrified @lion-clan-warrior[Lion Warrior] blocking the path to a chest containing a @fragrant-branch-of-yore and the @lion-mage-set
steps.ppxi26m6: Drop down to a ledge to the left of this structure, turn right and get a @soul-of-a-brave-warrior and @firebomb from the corpse
steps.1a8fwv7w: Go back the other direction on the ledge and use a @fragrant-branch-of-yore to free a @lion-clan-warrior[Lion Warrior] who will drop the @fang-key
steps.imceby3h: Cross the branch back to the bonfire, and jump out the window to the left down on to a ledge
steps.asad538k: Go in to the building and get a @soul-of-a-brave-warrior and @twilight-herb from the corpse and a @sublime-bone-dust from the chest
steps.dlgdn9vf: Go back to the ledge, jump across to the other ledge and get the @black-knight-halberd from the chest
steps.uvsci2cb: Jump out the window and across to the ledge and return back to the bonfire
steps.fw2asb50: Go back up to the towers, fall down the trap in the long grass and get the @homing-soulmass Sorcery from the chest
steps.vqik5ja7: Talk to @darkdiver-grandahl. This is the second of three locations where you need to talk to him to be able to join the @pilgrims-of-dark covenant
steps.bxbkp4ji: Drop down and head up the slope, avoiding all the pools of corrosive acid that will destroy gear
steps.06tqg19h: Kill all the @basilisk[Basilisks], get the @twinkling-titanite from the cave on the right, open the door and pick up the @fragrant-branch-of-yore
steps.q88ib81b: Talk to @weaponsmith-ornifex until you exhaust her dialog so she will appear later and allow you to make boss soul weapons
steps.qpr71lkk: Go back down the slope, drop out the hole and cross the branch back to the bonfire
steps.uvau01wl: Go back to the towers, go between them and up the hill to the fog gate

y7yz7w8b.content: Head in to the fog gate and kill the @scorpioness-najka boss

steps.ntjwspu4: If you talked to @manscorpion-tark earlier you can summon him outside the fog gate
steps.qa36l16c: You can also summon @bradley-of-the-old-guard between the two towers
steps.5a49mlrp: You can chop off her stingers when she embeds them in the ground but she will start using Homing Soulmass more often
steps.wi5u1ory: If you want the @flame-butterfly hanging on the tree you need to get her to knock it down
steps.mx5rzfta: You will get the @scorpioness-najka-soul and 23,000 souls
steps.5xq1rn92: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 5,750 souls each time

steps.c39jt9cc: Go through the long tunnel to the start of the @doors-of-pharros and clear the first area
steps.sety6pn0: Get the @prism-stone[Prism Stones] from the corpse
steps.r3ey508j: Go in to the cave and light the bonfire
steps.jd64z100: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.unim3k6j: Travel back to the @shaded-woods[Shaded Woods / Shaded Ruins] bonfire, go talk to @manscorpion-tark to get a @fragrant-branch-of-yore and learn the Warmup gesture
steps.t8ierjfl: Return to the bonfire and travel to the @doors-of-pharros[Doors of Pharros / Gyrm's Respite] bonfire

steps.509qdim1: Go back the way you came in, go up the ramp, get the @dragon-charm from the chest, keep going up and get the @lifegem from the corpse

br89k4ib.content: Talk to @lonesome-gavlan and buy or sell or anything you need to. He now sells more items

steps.pa2ifx4k: Return to the bonfire and go out the other door this time
steps.kajq8vh1: If you are online then keep alert because you can be called to invade members of the @rat-king-covenant while you are in this area
steps.vvn7rd7l: Be prepared to be invaded by @bowman-guthry if you are playing offline
steps.r2qaxqzm: Go through the door on the left, up the ramp and get the @gyrm-axe and @torch
steps.oils49ia: Drop down, use a @pharros-lockstone on the contraption in the water in front of the giant door with contraptions on either side, and go in and get @santier-s-spear from the chest
steps.jzfk0lnq: Go to the far end of the cave, get the @amber-herb[Amber Herbs] from the corpse and move in to the next cave
steps.jhoyrlul: Go up the ladder and get the @twisted-barricade Hex and @soul-of-a-proud-knight from the corpse
steps.dq1nh3w3: Walk around the ledge, use a @pharros-lockstone on the first contraption, go back down the ladder and into the area below the contraption
steps.k7c0jz7v: Go in the now open door, get the @faintstone and @twinkling-titanite from the chest, follow the ramp up and drop out back to the contraption
steps.mmy27xuf: Keep walking around the ledge and get the @titanite-chunk and @petrified-dragon-bone from the trap chest
steps.pa1qbb5c: Continue up the ledge, get the @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier and @pharros-lockstone from the corpse beside the stairs, and go in to the next area
steps.yapni53p: Walk around the ledge to the left, enter the room to light the bonfire, go back out and around the edge to loot the @soul-of-a-brave-warrior, then head back to the bonfire

c9cjjtnr.content: Head into the fog gate and kill the @royal-rat-authority boss

steps.cm92jwgu: There are no NPCs to summon for this fight
steps.j2lex2np: Kill the four small rats as quickly as possible and stay under his legs
steps.5v7hbg2j: You will get the @royal-rat-authority-soul, @rat-tail and 14,000 souls

steps.tizvx162: Go back to the bonfire and return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.3hgiz0o6: You can now buy the @flying-feline-boots for 6,000 souls from @sweet-shalquoir
steps.w9sw8wn6: Travel back to the @doors-of-pharros[Doors of Pharros / Gyrm's Respite] bonfire
steps.tz0ju6k0: Go back up the ramp towards @lonesome-gavlan, continue past him, watching out for the axe throwing @gyrm and kill the @crystal-lizard
steps.p4vpd22d: Continue on into @brightstone-cove-tseldora, picking up the @radiant-lifegem from the pot on the left
steps.yen4attl: Go ahead to light the bonfire

steps.vgxjb1t6: Get the three @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier and @large-soul-of-a-proud-knight near the cliff
steps.42b7bxi7: Destroy the wooden tower to get the @lacerating-arrow and break the jar beside the building to get a @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier
steps.6p35f934: Get the @titanite-shard from the well, break the wooden roof above it, go up the ramp and jump in to the well to get the @holy-water-urn[Holy Water Urns]
steps.ho73jt5a: Go along the tunnel, up the ladder, kill the mimic to get the @dark-leggings and @staff-of-wisdom[Staff of Wisdom], and leave the building
steps.goxojbzx: Go down the hill, watching out for the boulder traps, get the @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier, go up the ladder and get the @soul-of-a-brave-warrior
steps.kyuk04bb: Continue down the hill, get the @large-titanite-shard from the corpse on the ledge and open the door
steps.6q7uzygv: Follow the tunnel, clear out the spiders at the bottom, get the @heavy-bolt[Heavy Bolts] from the chest, and open the door to find a fog gate
steps.n2cw3zxk: Grab the @human-effigy from the pot and open the illusory wall in the opposite corner, then go up the stairs to get the @priestess-set

2c4tdzg4.content: Go through the fog gate and kill the @prowling-magus-congregation boss

steps.7b1x94x5: You can summon @benhart-of-jugo way back at the campsite in one of the tents
steps.0guqosem: This is the first of at least three boss fights you need to summon him for and have him survive to complete his quest
steps.m673vkkr: Use the benches for cover and get a chance to heal
steps.hcbq9c3v: You will get a @titanite-slab and 7,000 souls
steps.akmydobc: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 1,750 souls each time

steps.yzk724yw: Leave the building and go up the ladder in the alcove to the left as you go out the door
steps.0jp72g6x: Pick up the @fading-soul[Fading Souls], @bonfire-ascetic, @cleric-s-small-shield and @skeptic-s-spice from the corpses

10bts7yx.content: Talk to @cromwell-the-pardoner to have your sins pardoned and buy anything you need from him

steps.spo4ukz5: If you have at least 35 Faith he will give you the @ring-of-resistance
steps.fucqkhwt: Optionally, kill him to get the @ring-of-resistance
steps.vof66xgq: Go down the ladder, through the hole in the wall and follow the ledge around to the left to light the bonfire
steps.80ednc39: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.ojbar4n8: Travel back to the @brightstone-cove-tseldora[Brightstone Cove Tseldora / Chapel Threshold] bonfire
steps.fdw2f3au: This part of the area involves a lot of one-way paths. So the first priority is to get a useful bonfire to save on @homeward[Homeward Bones]
steps.es7d2104: Go down the steps and get the @soul-of-a-proud-knight from the corpse hidden under the stairs
steps.i753gvsd: Get the @wilted-dusk-herb[Wilted Dusk Herbs] from the pot and kill the @hollow-mage, but do not use the zip line yet
steps.1dcbgwb0: Carefully drop down to a ledge on the right
steps.bg13bnke: Go into the building, watch for the two @hollow-mage[Hollow Mages] and the hole in the floor, and get the @lightning-urn
steps.zu94fzgw: Go down the ladder, open the door and light the bonfire
steps.sg1t9t2t: Head outside and get the @petrified-dragon-bone from the right, watching out for the spider ambush
steps.vsbc19or: You may also be invaded by @bowman-guthry in this area
steps.qgcwa735: Go back to the pit, open the door to the left, get the @pharros-lockstone from the jar and the @flame-butterfly from behind the shelves

raspmhnn.content: Talk to @weaponsmith-ornifex and buy anything you need from her

steps.cyi4ok9b: She will also trade for boss soul weapons and shields, and upgrade your weapons and armor
steps.crwg1brr: Go back to the bonfire and travel back to the @brightstone-cove-tseldora[Brightstone Cove Tseldora / Chapel Threshold] bonfire, then go downstairs and take the zip line across
steps.wmzhu27k: Enter the house to watch @mild-mannered-pate and @creighton-the-wanderer fight and choose one of them to kill
steps.e1wmkp0f: Depending on who you kill, the survivor will give you either @pate-s-set (if you don't already have it) or @creighton-s-set, and @merchant-hag-melentia will sell the other
steps.cp9bu2gl: In both scenarios, talk to the survivor and get the @tseldora-den-key
steps.5qpl9ebp: Get the @charcoal-pine-resin[Charcoal Pine Resins] from the jar, go through the tunnel, open the first door and get the @torch
steps.ta29rg2j: Open the next door and quickly kill the @crystal-lizard to the right, and get the @titanite-chunk from the corpse on the left
steps.18zxyw0x: Drop down the ledge and break the shelves in the room to reveal a lever that lowers a platform with a chest
steps.0rembp63: Jump to it from the top of the steps to get the @southern-ritual-band[Southern Ritual Band +1]
steps.fnlenvka: Head outside and traverse the narrow ledge until you can safely drop down to the pit level, making sure to avoid the red @crystal-lizard, then head to the bonfire and warp back to the chapel bonfire
steps.zg2jw0x6: Go up to the front of the chapel and drop onto the ledge to kill the @crystal-lizard, if you haven't yet, then drop off onto the wooden platform and then drop down again to get the @large-titanite-shard
steps.xzkwctxi: Drop down off this ledge to the ledge below, using the pots as a guide, and get the @estus-flask-shard from the room
steps.z1vr9zne: Use the bonfire to get back up to the chapel bonfire again
steps.e83e4x5g: Go back to the front of the chapel and drop onto the ledge where the @crystal-lizard was
steps.xz8s4qa9: Jump across the gap to the stone building in the wall to get the @large-titanite-shard, then drop to the bottom level and use the bonfire to return to the chapel bonfire
steps.4izmfj0w: Go back in front of the chapel and drop onto the small stone structure next to the zip line, then down to the rock ledge to loot @titanite-chunk and @twinkling-titanite from the corpse
steps.0dova3a9: Drop down and make your way around the pit, and go into the last room
steps.2yfx7tb9: Smash the bookcases and get the @crescent-axe and @soul-vortex Sorcery from the chest
steps.3e9nueoj: Back in the main room, walk up the sand and into the corridor, and get the @titanite-chunk from the corpse
steps.1vx1ab94: Go outside, go into the house straight ahead of you, go upstairs and get the @torch from the urn and @large-titanite-shard from the ledge outside
steps.hhn1jkf4: Head outside again, go to the door on the other side and hit it with ranged attacks until the sand comes bursting out
steps.y8zfkmck: Go in and get the @engraved-gauntlets from the chest on the right and the @rusted-coin[Rusted Coins] from the trapped chest on the left
steps.gzsbknbv: Head through the archway and loot the corpses in the spikes for a @titanite-shard, @titanite-chunk[Titanite Chunks], @titanite-slab, and @torch[Torches]
steps.ye4pfj80: Go across the walkway, open the door, and kill all the spiders waiting to ambush you
steps.zlpzfkzt: Get the @poison-arrow from the urn and a @soul-of-a-hero and @gold-pine-resin[Gold Pine Resins] from behind a bench
steps.8eyvpi9p: The door on the right of the room is opened using the @brightstone-key, which you will get for killing the boss of this area
steps.smvks7t4: Pull the right lever, kill the unnamed Red Phantom and get the @homeward[Homeward Bones], then pull the left lever and kill the enemy waiting behind the door
steps.f2ceq0yp: Go up the ladder and start making your way down the maze of webs
steps.a8p96nf5: Get the @torch from behind the pillar of the second platform and the the @pharros-lockstone from the jar across from it
steps.a9cfypgp: Get the @radiant-lifegem from the corpse stuck in the web halfway down
steps.fo72xyi1: At the bottom pick up the @twilight-herb, @simpleton-s-spice and @corrosive-urn[Corrosive Urns]

c6x9y156.content: Go through the fog gate and kill @the-duke-s-dear-freja boss

steps.1vumivdh: You can summon @ashen-knight-boyd from behind a pillar at far end of the room from the fog gate
steps.pjvq39se: You can also summon @manhunter-o-harrah in the large spider room just before the maze of webs
steps.gzkt4nfz: You can also summon @bashful-ray in the room adjacent to @weaponsmith-ornifex
steps.ww8b361l: Take out the small spiders as quickly as possible to avoid distractions
steps.0yik23xo: Optionally if your build allows for it, you can wield a torch for the whole fight to completely pacify the small spiders
steps.55zo3zwg: You will get the @soul-of-the-duke-s-dear-freja and 42,000 souls
steps.52v8ny6n: This is one of four boss souls needed to open the door to the @shrine-of-winter
steps.p40vxcot: Once you have defeated her, examine the red light that appears to embrace the great soul
steps.skze1imn: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 10,500 souls each time

steps.92fbk38c: Go through the tunnel to the library and kill the Duke to get the @brightstone-key, a @fragrant-branch-of-yore and the @dark-quartz-ring[Dark Quartz Ring +1]
steps.1458cb13: Light the primal bonfire to return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.7ero1g14: Travel back to the @brightstone-cove-tseldora[Brightstone Cove Tseldora / Lower Brightstone Cove] bonfire and make your way back to the building with all the spiders hanging from the ceiling
steps.ws1focwh: You can now unlock the door on the right but be ready for the spider ambush when you open the second door
steps.7nvydum5: Open the chest to get the @black-knight-ultra-greatsword, the @great-fireball Pyromancy and a @fire-seed
steps.gsfed4p8: Get back to a bonfire and travel to @the-lost-bastille[The Lost Bastille / Straid's Cell] bonfire
steps.ollkpsm0: Talk to @straid-of-olaphis, make any boss souls weapons you need and buy anything you need from him
steps.pnzw0fx4: Go downstairs, though the gate, grab the @lifegem from around the corner to the right, and head towards the fog gate, watching out the for the sniper above it
steps.gfjbwetn: Go inside the building, out to the right, climb up the ladder and light the bonfire

steps.2wiiaw01: Get the @large-soul-of-a-lost-undead from the ledge inside the building, go down the ladder, down the stairs and get the @human-effigy
steps.d21c1m2o: Go down in the elevator, jumping off to the platform near the bottom to get the @lacerating-knife[Lacerating Knives]
steps.b4i040ea: Kill the @flexile-sentry and pick up the @blossom-kite-shield and @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier
steps.5k88uomj: As you came down the stairs into the water, there is a hidden wall to the right leading outside
steps.17s3jdz3: Open it, hug the wall to the left and get the @northern-ritual-band and @bleed-stone from the corpse
steps.w8s8oud4: Kill the exploding @undead-citizen[Undead Citizens] in the lower cells and get the @soul-of-a-proud-knight and @pharros-lockstone
steps.n4a163tb: Go up the stairs to the upper cells, open the cell using the @bastille-key, kill the @heide-knight to receive the @heide-spear, and get the @fire-seed
steps.rhn0y2gz: Open the gate or door, continue along the walkway towards the fog gate, and get the @radiant-lifegem from the alcove on the left
steps.qrl348f7: Go up both sets of stairs, unlock the doors, use a @flame-butterfly to light your torch and ignite the oil, and get the @smooth-silky-stone[Smooth and Silky Stone]

jjfoyyb7.content: Go through the fog gate and kill @the-lost-sinner[Lost Sinner] boss

steps.eod6hgvl: You can summon @lucatiel-of-mirrah away back at the bottom of the elevator
steps.hdv0oum8: This is the fourth of at least three boss fights you need to summon her for and have her survive to complete her quest
steps.oqlc09f3: You can also summon @sellsword-luet from a cell opposite the @heide-knight
steps.13r7jkao: Make sure to light both oil pools to light up the arena and make targeting easier
steps.zcws0x3l: You will get the @soul-of-the-lost-sinner and 45,000 souls
steps.vcsuhql5: This is one of four boss souls needed to open the door to the @shrine-of-winter
steps.fmonwcgf: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 11,250 souls each time

steps.dgal84h1: Continue on, getting the @fragrant-branch-of-yore and @elizabeth-mushroom from the chest, and light the primal bonfire
steps.waqyquwk: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.rw165w1w: You can now buy the @penal-set from @maughlin-the-armourer
steps.5riqrpw7: You should now have collected the four boss souls need to open the door to the @shrine-of-winter
steps.avqaqa7k: Travel to the @shaded-woods[Shaded Woods / Ruined Fork Road] bonfire and head out the left archway
steps.fx0wwszy: Continue along the path and get the @large-soul-of-a-proud-knight, @human-effigy, and @twinkling-titanite from behind the bridge support to the left
steps.x46c6fbr: Keep going along the path, watch out for the invisible enemy, and pick up the @dragonslayer-s-crescent-axe and @golden-falcon-shield
steps.poprv1jh: Go up and open the door, go past the serpent shrine and down the winding path, turn right and get the @soul-of-a-hero
steps.otx4ev4r: Head back the other way, get the @divine-blessing and kill the invisible enemies
steps.zq1h5fam: Continue on, getting the @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier and @human-effigy from the corpse, and follow the steps all the way up
steps.2t3xsua5: Get the @holy-water-urn[Holy Water Urns] from behind the boulder and kill the @crystal-lizard

steps.t9vcuqzn: Go up the steps and talk to the @emerald-herald
steps.nthd44ub: Continue up the stairs, killing the @primal-knight[Mastodons] and the archers
steps.apmqo3vk: Start killing the respawning @royal-swordsman[Royal Swordsmen] close to the statues at the door to get the door to open
steps.oczb8wy4: Before heading inside, go around the right to find a chest with the @great-combustion pyromancy and a @fire-seed
steps.t2kfa27j: Go into the castle and go up the stairs in front of you

nrqv9td4.content: Talk to @chancellor-wellager, learn the This One's Me gesture and buy anything you need from him

steps.4w17usty: He will sell some more weapons and shields when you have defeated the @looking-glass-knight later in this area
steps.lj32yp6o: Take a quick look in the throne room at the top of the steps, which will be empty for now
steps.jurmn3nf: Head back down the staircase and go into the hallway behind the stairs
steps.c0wc2fjh: The door to your left is guarded by a @royal-guard[Syan Soldier] and contains a chest with a @sublime-bone-dust
steps.r5eathrd: Open the door at the far end, watch for the ambush by the @royal-swordsman behind it, go down the ladder, open the two blue doors and light the bonfire
steps.aovr8mq7: Return to @majula to burn your @sublime-bone-dust, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.vbmpb0ra: You can now buy the @executioner-set from @titchy-gren at the @undead-purgatory bonfire
steps.jv436q5g: Return to the @drangleic-castle[Drangleic Castle / King's Gate] bonfire

odth9eng.content: Head right into the room with all of the statues and start killing them to open the doors and activate the two large statues at the end, which illuminate the area. Note that behind each door is a respawning @ruin-sentinel

steps.awk2k65b: The first room on the left has no items
steps.com8i5h0: The second room on the left has a @pharros-lockstone
steps.jyr123f0: The third room on the left has a collapsible floor. See below
steps.od18myht: The first room on the right is the way forward in the level. See below
steps.sormbywy: The second room on the right has a @mastodon-greatsword
steps.gknwos2n: The third room on the right has a @royal-soldier-s-ring[Royal Soldier's Ring + 1]

steps.qtoge6zo: Fall down the collapsing floor in the third room on the left and pick up the @faraam-set
steps.h2q3n4yv: Light the bonfire in the cave on the right and go talk to @darkdiver-grandahl in the cave on the left
steps.b2usqtl5: This is the third of three locations where you need to talk to him to be able to join the @pilgrims-of-dark covenant

n93h4n3g.content: If you join his covenant you can talk to him and buy anything you need from him

steps.u8k0u26f: If you joined the covenant you can now do the @dark-chasm-of-old areas. They are very difficult and are covered later in the #dark-chasm-of-old section
steps.ygnag7uj: Use the bonfire to go back to the @drangleic-castle[Drangleic Castle / King's Gate] bonfire
steps.vt7i7i2r: Go back to the statue room, go in to the first room on the right and get the @dark-arrow from the chest and @frozen-flower (DLC) from the corpse
steps.0rnmwcn4: Get the @soul-of-a-hero, @old-radiant-lifegem[Old Radiant Lifegems] and @monastery-charm from under the stairs
steps.iusa4uaq: Continue until you get to a pool of corrosive acid, at which point you need to start watching out for the snipers in this area
steps.o127m2hq: Get naked, get the @elizabeth-mushroom and then the @corrosive-urn[Corrosive Urns] from the chest, and get dressed again
steps.ptvkqvil: Continue up the path until you reach a room with masks lining the walls
steps.f3adotsw: The chest here contains a @large-soul-of-a-brave-warrior and @twinkling-titanite, but is trapped and will cause the masks to shoot poison darts when opened, so quickly roll after looting it
steps.2s1vptob: Go up to the next room and loot the @fire-greatarrow, @destructive-greatarrow, @torch[Torches], and a @petrified-something[Petrified Dragon Bone]
steps.sr4gq4f7: Watch out for the cursed painting and move on to be invaded by the @nameless-usurper
steps.k77crdox: Continue up, go down the ladder on the left and get the @soul-of-a-brave-warrior from the corpse
steps.mg5bu7b4: Go down the next ladder and get the @hunter-s-blackbow and the @dark-arrow from the chest
steps.igf3avb5: Go back up one ladder, use the illusory wall and light the bonfire
steps.ft180c5k: Go back up to the stairs, continue on, talk to the Queen and continue on to the fog gate

bqy6m2h2.content: Go through the fog gate and kill @dragonriders boss

steps.xc3rwqfz: You can summon @pilgrim-bellclaire right outside the fog gate
steps.eejiymrv: You can also summon @bashful-ray in the room with the six doors, between the giant golem statues
steps.pa8jzm6y: Take out the one on top of the platform firing arrows at you as quickly as possible
steps.6b77lq6j: You will get the @dragonrider-soul and 26,000 souls
steps.lvoreui1: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 6,500 souls each time

steps.cfs0dvuk: Go through to the next room, light the bonfire and talk to @benhart-of-jugo
steps.feuuthny: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.h97c89r5: Return to the @drangleic-castle[Drangleic Castle / Central Castle Drangleic] bonfire
steps.1gijxamd: Go down the stairs, up the very long ladder, and lure the enemies from the adjecent room towards large statue to enable the elevator with their souls
steps.4e4f7gfz: Go out the door and get the @old-knight-hammer, @caitha-s-chime and the @soul-greatsword Sorcery from the chests
steps.aela9xi3: Head into the next room, kill the @executioner-s-chariot for @gower-s-ring-of-protection, then head upstairs
steps.cazm5e4d: Get the @firestorm Pyromancy from the chest on the right (as you go up the first flight), but be wary of the mimic on the left containing a @petrified-dragon-bone and a @washing-pole
steps.yx87mlwf: Go out the main door, climb up the ladder on the right and kill the @alonne-knight archer and @belfry-gargoyles[Belfry Gargoyle]
steps.1r0onh0a: Go through the smaller door, get the @repair-powder and @flame-butterfly[Flame Butterflies] from the corpse, and the @estus-flask-shard from the chest
steps.3hc3yq5e: Pull the lever to unblock the door, head down back to the bonfire and return to @majula to to upgrade your @estus-flask
steps.7ogwkaiz: Return to the @drangleic-castle[Drangleic Castle / Central Castle Drangleic] bonfire
steps.k1rjhimz: Go down the stairs again, up in the elevator, open the door and examine the cage in front of you, which you can't do anything with yet
steps.rfis74q5: Get the @key-to-king-s-passage, @soul-vessel, @fire-seed and @strong-magic-shield Sorcery from the chests
steps.kysxcaoh: Go back down on the elevator, use the key to open the door, go in and get the @alluring-skull[Alluring Skulls] from the corpse on the right
steps.24a7e951: Continue forward, remembering that four of the statues come to life, and get the @lifegem, @soul-of-a-proud-knight, @twinkling-titanite, and @petrified-something from behind the pillars

n4iq8pnq.content: Go through the fog gate and kill the @looking-glass-knight boss

steps.jaev0q2v: You can summon @benhart-of-jugo to the left of the fog gate
steps.4mmsimgd: This is the second of at least three boss fights you need to summon him for and have him survive to complete his quest
steps.8lmvruwj: You can also summon @ashen-knight-boyd on the right one pillar back from the fog gate
steps.mjrniovr: You can also summon @sellsword-luet in the room past the giant mechanism
steps.krj705f3: When he is down to half health he will summon either an NPC or player phantom to help him
steps.5720y59p: You will get the @looking-glass-knight-soul and 25,500 souls
steps.x692xjjy: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 6,375 souls each time

steps.14i0djmd: Go out the archway and get the @soul-bolt Sorcery, @spell-quartz-ring[Spell Quartz Ring +2] and the @bonfire-ascetic[Bonfire Ascetics] from the chest on the left
steps.gszu16vr: Take the elevator down, continue forward, getting the @green-blossom from behind the branches, continue through the tunnel, and light the bonfire
steps.jczlp24a: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need

jh0txr8v.content: You can travel back to the @drangleic-castle[Drangleic Castle / King's Gate] bonfire and go back to @chancellor-wellager, who will now sell more items

steps.sj7qnvw9: Travel back to the @shrine-of-amana[Shrine of Amana / Tower of Prayer] bonfire

steps.ylnrvxpr: Go down the steps, open the door and go along the ledge and hit the branch to knock down the item
steps.nfvf9qfo: Go to the end of the ledge and get the @wilted-dusk-herb and @skeptic-s-spice from the chest
steps.4w8j488p: Go back to the building, go down and get the @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier from under the stairs at the bottom
steps.lfcf2xht: From this point watch out for ranged attacks from @amana-shrine-maiden[Priestesses of Amana], @lizardman[Corrupted Lurkers] hidden in the water and underwater cliffs
steps.gccmmpuv: Carrying a torch helps greatly with visibility, but it also makes the @lizardman[Corrupted Lurkers] more aggressive, so stay alert
steps.2ifs63wb: Head outside, go around to the right and get the @flame-butterfly and @twinkling-titanite that you knocked down
steps.dtv0xnfz: Go back and grab the @human-effigy[Human Effigies], then move forwards towards the hut and talk to the first @milfanito to exhaust her dialog and get a @smooth-silky-stone[Smooth and Silky Stone]
steps.n7gpukz0: Go outside and around the side of the house, watching out for the curse pot, and get the @crimson-water[Crimson Waters] from the chest
steps.7b96o2bp: Continue on and pick up the @bleeding-serum, @soul-of-a-lost-undead[Souls of a Lost Undead], @torch, @skeptic-s-spice and @large-soul-of-a-proud-knight
steps.bmrw2qtr: Get the @dragon-charm from the chest submerged in the water to the left before you go in to the cave
steps.tabibq62: Go in to the cave, clear the cave to the left and get the @twinkling-titanite and @smooth-silky-stone[Smooth and Silky Stones] from the chest
steps.7m9piebr: Head through the fog gate and light the bonfire in the ruins on the right
steps.sou44zxl: Use a @pharros-lockstone on the contraption in the water to the left of the ramp to get the @helix-halberd
steps.rfzl6t77: Continue on, to the next set of ruins to find a @fire-seed
steps.ny6tjqyr: To the left of these ruins is a submerged path leading to a locked door that you can't open until you have killed @king-vendrick
steps.fg9b3wh7: To the right is an @ogre that you should take out with range attacks
steps.l9dn5zx3: Very carefully follow the path shown by the pillars where the @ogre was to get a @estus-flask-shard and the @sunlight-blade Miracle from a chest
steps.mz161v6n: Go back and into the building to get a @large-soul-of-a-proud-knight, @old-radiant-lifegem, and @smooth-silky-stone[Smooth and Silky Stone]
steps.pbbtirhc: Out the back door and slightly to the right is a submerged chest with the @fire-tempest Pyromancy past some cursed urns
steps.0dzx0wr5: It's tough to find but aim roughly for where two roots come down from the roof into the water but be careful not to fall off the underwater cliff
steps.7196qtcy: Continue past the hut, break the branches to the cave on the left, kill the @ogre and get the @singer-s-dress and @life-ring[Life Ring +2]
steps.achtz1zt: Get the @alluring-skull[Alluring Skulls] from the ramp to the left of the fog gate, and the @soul-of-a-hero and @divine-blessing from a narrow ledge to the right
steps.jvw1vxz3: Go through the fog gate, light the bonfire and return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.h589va75: Travel back to the @shrine-of-amana[Shrine of Amana / Rhoy's Resting Place] bonfire
steps.9msfkyn8: Go out the cave, along the ledge to the right and get the @large-soul-of-a-proud-knight and @green-blossom
steps.nfoe90kk: Start clearing out the @lizardman[Corrupted Lurkers] in the circular area and get ready to be invaded by the red phantom @peculiar-kindalur[Peculiar Kindular]
steps.9ql32z8j: Carefully get the @homing-crystal-soulmass Sorcery from the corpse on the broken pillar
steps.y12iettd: Continue on, get the @large-soul-of-a-proud-knight and @green-blossom from the corpse, and go into the hut
steps.xyo4v91r: Talk to the second @milfanito who will vanish

2duwnz0d.content: Go through the fog gate and kill the @demon-of-song boss

steps.vy6p6r8z: You can summon @felicia-the-brave at the bonfire
steps.ysg3mtfx: You can also summon @lone-hunter-schmidt in the hut just past the first @ogre
steps.gfpi7bft: You will get the @demon-of-song-soul and 26,000 souls
steps.xa2i64p9: You will also receive the @key-to-the-embedded that you can use to unlock the cage at the top of the elevator in @drangleic-castle
steps.z3he3tmg: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 6,500 souls each time

steps.s0xqtsut: Leave the boss area, follow the path straight through the ruins until you reach the tower, get the @magic-arrow from the chest, and use a @fragrant-branch-of-yore to access the bonfire
steps.sn15z023: There's a door upstairs that you can't open just yet
steps.cgesmb4x: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.2jp4rtf7: Travel back to the @drangleic-castle[Drangleic Castle / Central Drangleic Castle] bonfire, go down the stairs and up in the elevator
steps.jyzgg8pg: Open the cage with the @key-to-the-embedded, and talk to the third @milfanito to get the @ring-of-the-dead
steps.jxvp1qqb: Go back to the bonfire and travel back to @shrine-of-amana[Shrine of Amana / Rise of the Dead] bonfire and kill or curse yourself to get into hollow form, or return here after you have died at a later point
steps.k0tgvh1q: Go upstairs, open the door, take out the pyromancer and go into the building to talk to the @milfanito
steps.5aykdzc9: She will give you a @fire-seed, @divine-blessing, and @petrified-something
steps.i4vbawxe: If you run out of @human-effigy[Human Effigies] you can come back here and revive to human for free
steps.17jyqp5l: Go downstairs, watch out for another pyromancer, and get another @fire-seed from the corpse in the cave below the stairs
steps.2nt198mb: Go outside, kill the third pyromancer who drops a @bonfire-ascetic, and drop down to the left of the stairs and get the @manslayer from the chest
steps.7jkfkedt: Circle around to the other side of the stairs to get a @bonfire-ascetic from a chest, careful not to fall into the deep water
steps.vvh74pbx: Head back to the bonfire, go outside, and open the door guarded by a @royal-guard[Syan Soldier], and take the elevator down

steps.copx8caq: Go into the crypt and light the bonfire, then get the @radiant-lifegem from the right of the stairs
steps.fmszgkaj: Head up the stairs, making sure to not have a lit @torch or the @cast-light spell active, and continue until you hear @grave-warden-agdayne talking to you

mo4y4sqi.content: Go up the stairs, get the @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier, talk to him, learn the Have Mercy! gesture, and buy anything you need from him

steps.cdc8l9my: Later, once you have the @king-s-ring he will give you @agdayne-s-set[Agdayne's Armor Set] and @darkdrift
steps.dm6s5yiy: Continue on and drop down to the left beside the door to get the @simpleton-s-spice and @soul-of-a-great-hero
steps.flo0nj1h: Go up the ladder, get the @crushed-eye-orb and @fire-seed from the chest, and drop down to the bridge
steps.wgzman2k: Drop off to the left of the fog gate, go down the stairs and, if you dare, light the statue to greatly illuminate the area at the cost of summoning a total of eleven non-respawning @insolent-knight red phantoms around the crypt
steps.60e26zod: Go back up the stairs, get the @soul-vessel from the chest, go up the ladder and get the @soul-of-a-hero
steps.7bncdq2x: Go down the broken ladder and light the bonfire, then feel free to head around the corner and pass through the fog wall to get rid of it
steps.ffstez43: Destroy all the statues in the room to stop the @leydia-pyromancer from spawning
steps.l4lej9x0: There are also bells that, when hit, will summon all of the @leydia-pyromancer if their gravestones haven't been destroyed yet, so watch your cleave
steps.twvfuq2q: Get the @simpleton-s-spice, @black-firebomb[Black Firebombs], @titanite-chunk, and @petrified-dragon-bone, @smooth-silky-stone[Smooth and Silky Stones], and @human-effigy[Human Effigies] around the room
steps.6l3l5zef: Go up the ladder in the corner of the room and get the @dried-fingers, @bonfire-ascetic, and @twinkling-titanite from the chest
steps.obh54jgh: Drop down in to the next room, destroy the two statues and get the @soul-of-a-lost-undead and the @bracing-knuckle-ring[Bracing Knuckle Ring +2] from the corpses
steps.5lqbnk38: Go up the steps to the next room and prepare to be invaded by the @nameless-usurper for the second time
steps.nxsq5xdz: To the right as you came in there is an illusory wall with a @wall-warrior, and @avelyn and @heavy-bolt[Heavy Bolts] in the chest
steps.ncw26t7w: Watch out for more phantoms in the wall and pick up the @soul-of-a-hero and @divine-blessing
steps.0g0h125k: Make your way down the corridor, watching for more wall phantoms, kill the two @imperious-knight and drop down the hole into a tough area
steps.qoji90cw: Before tackling it, leave the room by the widest hallway, turn left outside and pull the lever to open the shortcut
steps.r57igxk1: Head back into the room and quickly destroy the statues, including the one in the far hallway, and also kill the bell ringing hollow in one of the other hallways
steps.8sr2xnll: With your back to the exit hallway, open the illusory wall halfway down the wall on the left and use a @pharros-lockstone
steps.n3lhtvgu: Go to the other side of the room, hit the hidden wall, and get the @great-lightning-spear and @olenford-s-staff from the chest
steps.1iarn4zx: Get the @mace-of-the-insolent, @soul-of-a-hero, @radiant-lifegem, and @homeward[Homeward Bone] from the corpses in the room, and @large-soul-of-a-proud-knight and @dragon-charm from a side hallway
steps.99lavyqc: Go back out and before going into the next room get the @magic-stone and @darknight-stone
steps.58jjldwd: Head into the room, quickly drop off to the right and kill the hollow before he has a chance to ring the bell, then kill the two others that will attempt to as well
steps.c85fo5c6: At the end of the hall are two @royal-guard[Syan Soldiers] and a non-respawning @dragonrider
steps.ymr8x3nd: After they are dealt with, open the chests on either side of the stairs for @poison-throwing-knife[Poison Throwing Knives], a @darknight-stone, @torch[Torches], and a @fragrant-branch-of-yore

ufrrl9a2.content: Go through the fog gate and kill the @velstadt-the-royal-aegis boss

steps.242xckzy: You can summon @grave-warden-agdayne beside a pillar near the stairs
steps.njlvl6jx: You can also summon @devotee-scarlett just before meeting @grave-warden-agdayne in a room with two @leydia-pyromancer
steps.v7op9tid: You will get the @soul-of-velstadt and 50,000 souls
steps.6omihspc: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 12,500 souls each time

steps.ig2ftru2: In the next room is an optional boss, @king-vendrick, but he is very difficult until you collect at least four @soul-of-a-giant[Souls of a Giants]
steps.d4mzo8ei: You do however need the @king-s-ring that's in the room with him. Luckily he won't attack you until you attack him
steps.vz1x8qr5: Go in and get the @king-s-ring, then come back out and talk to the @emerald-herald who is now at the top of the steps
steps.3iafo1mw: Head back to the bonfire and return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need

mj9nfv06.content: Now that you've seen @king-vendrick, @stone-trader-chloanne will now sell more items

wuqdg8k5.content: Now that you have the @crushed-eye-orb you can invade @licia-of-lindeldt

steps.ppirjlhy: Go down the stone steps to her and the orb will start to tremble
steps.ummtjsam: Make sure you have bought everything you need from her and use the orb to invade her world as a red phantom
steps.8vzur3e7: This can be a tricky fight because the area is small, her miracles hit hard and she heals a lot
steps.odcx6pwh: She will drop the @rotunda-lockstone, the @soothing-sunlight Miracle, the @saint-s-set, and the @idol-s-chime

steps.acs865s4: Travel to the @shaded-woods[Shaded Woods / Ruined Fork Road] bonfire and head out the middle archway
steps.ixpu6fpv: Follow the path, picking up the @red-tearstone-ring from the water if you didn't earlier
steps.lldfit1e: At the door put on the @king-s-ring to open it and remember to switch back your ring

steps.0e6zb6g9: Pick up the @soul-of-a-nameless-soldier and the @petrified-dragon-bone from the bush to the left
steps.k4uokfbs: Clear out the @kobold[Toxic Rats] in the area, and get the @poison-throwing-knife[Poison Throwing Knives] and @alluring-skull[Alluring Skulls] from the corpses
steps.viojablr: Kill the mimic in the corner to get the @dark-mask and @sunset-staff
steps.e4244ewq: Go into the hut, light the bonfire, and talk to @lucatiel-of-mirrah
steps.loh1922m: If you completed her quest successfully she will give you the @mirrah-greatsword and @lucatiel-s-set
steps.qqjcualf: Go up the steps, get the @radiant-lifegem from the pool and the @twilight-herb from the alcove to the left of the door
steps.kvuaesey: Enter the building and get ready to be invaded by @aslatiel-of-mirrah
steps.3puhdlef: Open the door and notice the inactive dragon skeleton, which doesn't attack until four sconces in the area are lit
steps.hed68jt2: Once the sconces are lit, return to the dragon skeleton and it will lunge forward
steps.qc2t2j6e: Run out of the room quickly and he will die after the lunge, dropping the @aldia-key
steps.sxtjtvl2: Grab the @fading-soul from the corpse, head under the stairs, and go around to the right to find an imprisoned @royal-sorcerer-navlaan

3ermc9mo.content: If you talk to him while hollow, you will be able to start his assassination quest

steps.js8tiuif: First, he will ask you to kill @laddersmith-gilligan and show him the @ladder-miniature as proof
steps.ld4q7pgb: You can either buy the ladder for 7,999 souls or kill him to get it
steps.c2ub0u6t: You will get the @dispelling-ring as a reward
steps.tqyq14wv: Second, he will ask you to kill @cale-the-cartographer and show him @cale-s-helm as proof
steps.2kwpl9t5: You can either complete @cale-the-cartographer[Cale's quest], which ends with the defeat of the final boss, or kill him to get it
steps.4xiyppgd: You will get a @simpleton-s-spice as a reward
steps.qsh0bjcy: Third, he will ask you to kill @felkin-the-outcast and show him the @sunset-staff as proof
steps.woa261nq: You can either find the staff earlier in @aldia-s-keep or kill him to get it
steps.riyw20zd: You will get the @forbidden-sun Pyromancy as a reward
steps.jzhdmhed: Lastly, he will ask you to kill the @emerald-herald and show him the @aged-feather as proof
steps.ju9ix5us: You can either get the feather from her later in the @dragon-shrine or kill her to get it
steps.i736818c: You will get the @unleash-magic Sorcery as a reward
steps.j1gg1ukz: If you talk to him again he will give you the @chaos-set

steps.k7sl2e3w: If you are human, you have the option of freeing him using the lever around the other side but he will invade you in various places

kten2e9o.content: If you complete his quest or decide to free him you will be able to buy stuff from him

steps.ky9z06i6: Go up the right stairs, around to the right, avoid the red @crystal-lizard, and get the @great-magic-barrier miracle from the chest
steps.8dgf0xd2: Head back, kill the three phantoms that break out of the mirrors, and pick up the @large-soul-of-a-brave-warrior from the body on the mirror, @northern-ritual-band[Northern Ritual Band +2] and @petrified-dragon-bone from a corpse near a pillar, and a @brightbug from a chest
steps.s1zbjx4o: Go back to the stairs and use a @fragrant-branch-of-yore on the petrified @ogre to retrieve the @dragon-acolyte-mask from behind him
steps.zoxe0fif: Take the second set of stairs up and kill the @giant-basilisk that will drop a @magic-stone
steps.92bdsasy: Pick up the @crimson-water, go around to the right and get the @bonfire-ascetic[Bonfire Ascetics] from the chest
steps.q0gjqvnx: Go back and through the door, pull the chain on the statue to open the next door, go through it and use a @pharros-lockstone to light up the corridor
steps.pl5ao8ew: Go down the corridor, watching for the @dragon-acolyte behind the paintings and ignoring the caged @ogre, and pick up the @radiant-lifegem
steps.4u9mjdf3: Go in the first door on the left, pick up the @pharros-lockstone behind some shelves, down the first set of steps, and use the illusory wall on the left to find a bonfire
steps.4bg8v9jr: Head down the next set of stairs, open the cage but don't go in, and kill the two @hunting-dog[Molerats]
steps.javtqv8e: Get naked and get the @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier, @corrosive-urn[Corrosive Urns], @divine-blessing, @soul-geyser Sorcery, and @petrified-dragon-bone
steps.b9zoji0a: Get dressed again, go back up to the corridor, and open the door on the opposite wall with the @aldia-key
steps.xpj7agpm: Get the @soul-of-a-proud-knight and @large-soul-of-a-brave-warrior from corpses, @cracked-red-eye-orb[Cracked Red Eye Orbs] from the first mimic, @bonfire-ascetic from the second mimic, and @wilted-dusk-herb[Wilted Dusk Herbs] from the third mimic
steps.unoooobp: If you dare, pull the lever to release all of the creatures from their cages, including a mimic that drops the @black-witch-s-staff and another mimic that drops a @fragrant-branch-of-yore
steps.cn1omvgi: Go back out the door you came in, go down to the end of the hallway, and bait an @ogre into smashing the wooden door on the left of the hallway
steps.w5kjn0tw: Get the @malformed-shell from the chest and continue down the corridor
steps.lfkgzlrd: Watch out for an @ogre that will smash through the wall, and get the @simpleton-s-spice and @twilight-herb from the corpse

41djd500.content: Go through the fog gate and kill the @guardian-dragon boss

steps.vi8cgtzw: You may summon @sellsword-luet back in the mirror room
steps.7jm6qmxc: You will get the @guardian-dragon-soul and 37,000 souls
steps.ialf5g83: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 9,250 souls each time

steps.6y2ewdcc: Continue on, get the @dragon-scale from the corpse and use the elevator

steps.fyleoxg8: Go up the path, ignoring the fork to the left for now, and talk to the @emerald-herald to get the @aged-feather
steps.ri7yalio: Head back to the fork, follow it along the bridge, and light the bonfire
steps.jeioqpsc: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.8iag54ph: From the bonfire, go up the path, across the bridge and use a @fragrant-branch-of-yore to enter the cave, then grab the @radiant-lifegem[Bonfire Ascetic]
steps.ve258b0u: Further ahead on the right, kill the @crystal-lizard and get the @radiant-lifegem
steps.po5s4xwz: Go up the path, kill the three @crystal-lizard[Crystal Lizards], then kill the @guardian-dragon for the @flame-quartz-ring[Flame Quartz Ring +2]
steps.fiv2xnp8: There is another @crystal-lizard up the ramp to the right
steps.2101lbto: Pick up the @darknight-stone, @dragon-tooth, @boltstone, and @soul-of-a-brave-warrior from the corpses
steps.zb3lxxer: Cross the next bridge and pick up the @old-radiant-lifegem
steps.4omfy8kk: Go across the next bridge, cross the next bridge, follow the right to take out the @dark-priestess and get the @petrified-dragon-bone, and kill the three @crystal-lizard[Crystal Lizards] in the area with the dragon
steps.wkbwjwti: Kill the second @guardian-dragon for the @fire-tempest pyromancy
steps.y4cgl9jo: Pick up the @soul-of-a-great-hero and @large-soul-of-a-brave-warrior from the corpses
steps.4q234kcr: Go into the cave, drop off the ledge to the right, quickly turn around and kill the @crystal-lizard
steps.ed7iakj4: Drop all the way down for another @crystal-lizard, then kill the third @guardian-dragon for @twinkling-titanite, @petrified-dragon-bone, and @petrified-something
steps.qpfa96fc: Pick up the @soul-of-a-great-hero, @ring-of-the-evil-eye[Ring of the Evil Eye +1], @bleed-stone, @dragon-charm, and @firedrake-stone
steps.ruw3u7g5: Go into the cave on the right and drop off the ledge
steps.f7kifrql: Pick up the @soul-of-a-brave-warrior and @pharros-lockstone, and use the @aged-feather to get back to the bonfire
steps.itsgylho: Go up the ladder, ignore the zip line, go down the path and drop off the ledge to get a @twinkling-titanite
steps.uiz53ip7: Use the feather, go up the ladder, zip line across and try to drop off onto the platform to get the @soul-of-a-great-hero
steps.k0ljxi6g: Again feather back to the bonfire, go up the ladder, across the zip line and head across the final bridge and into the building to light the bonfire
steps.6bdc9bz9: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.942qo9ng: Travel back to the @dragon-shrine[Dragon Shrine / Shrine Entrance] bonfire

steps.nijmikc6: The @dragon-knight[Dragon Knights] do not attack unless you avoid fighting the @drakekeeper[Drakekeepers] or the one glowing @dragon-knight on the long staircase at the very end, or if you summon a phantom
steps.sn7ofgx9: Go up the stairs, kill the @drakekeeper, go through the door to the right, and get the @bonfire-ascetic[Bonfire Ascetics] from the chest
steps.wljwhept: Use a @pharros-lockstone on the contraption hidden below the stairs and get the @judgment-set
steps.s069q9sk: Go up the stairs, through the archways on the left, up the stairs, get the @twinkling-titanite[Twinkling Titanites] from the chest, then head into the tower to get the @faintstone
steps.mf6p9u7v: Jump across the gap and get the @drakekeeper-s-greataxe and @drakekeeper-s-greatshield from the chest
steps.9huvdk33: Drop down, go up the stairs, kill the @drakekeeper, cross the bridge and drop down to the two chests
steps.203sodqt: Go into the next area, kill the @drakekeeper, and get the @skeptic-s-spice and @twilight-herb from the corpse in the alcove
steps.4wb9ji9c: Open the door, get the @third-dragon-ring from the chest, and get invaded by @dragonfang-villard
steps.nxxau3pi: Go up the spiral staircase and kill him, pick up the @petrified-egg, and get the @petrified-something from the chest
steps.6d3wfpuw: Drop off to the ledge, get the @crystal-magic-weapon Sorcery and the @fragrant-branch-of-yore from the chest, drop down again and open the door to the right
steps.hyxj0ph6: Open the next door and make your way up the stairs to defeat the glowing @dragon-knight, then go through the long corridor
steps.0a1qj3t8: Talk to the @ancient-dragon to get the @ashen-mist-heart

t43o0ssk.content: If you feel up to the challenge, kill the @ancient-dragon boss

steps.30zcd7x8: You can summon @head-of-vengarl just outside the boss area
steps.kvvkk3no: You can also summon @melinda-the-butcher back at the bottom of the stairs
steps.cp2uu0l7: You will get a @soul-of-a-giant, @petrified-dragon-bone, and 120,000 souls
steps.p1kuc98c: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 30,000 souls each time

steps.by9f47w7: Use your @aged-feather to return to the bonfire
steps.wmo3b9nd: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need

fn8zufbu.content: Now that you have the @petrified-egg you can join the @dragon-remnants covenant

steps.p1xmwc6l: Travel to the @iron-keep[Iron Keep / Threshold Bridge] bonfire
steps.ws0pa8yt: Go across the bridge, inside and go right to talk to @magerold-of-lanafir
steps.6st60fds: While you're here incense any spells and buy anything you need from him

steps.rz995gx8: Travel to the @forest-of-fallen-giants[Forest of Fallen Giants / Cardinal Tower] bonfire and head up to the area where you fought the @the-pursuer
steps.2xtlgh6x: Talk to @benhart-of-jugo, examine the tree to enter the memory. You will have about 5 minutes to complete it
steps.y46sprmj: Go forward, talk to @benhart-of-jugo again, head up the left stairs and clear the room
steps.xehjeg0q: Get the @fading-soul, use a @pharros-lockstone and get the @soul-of-a-hero[Souls of a Hero] from the trapped chest behind the wall
steps.qg7k9yy0: Don't waste a @pharros-lockstone on the second contraption, it's a trap
steps.4vddw2l7: To the right of the trapped contraption is a illusory wall, use it and get the @steel-set and @fire-seed from the chests
steps.qkazisfa: Go up the stairs to the roof, clear it out, and hit the wooden support on the wheel in the far left corner to drop a platform
steps.n0l09n3v: Roll off the roof on to the platform, jump into the room, and get @simpleton-s-spice, @skeptic-s-spice, and @bonfire-ascetic[Bonfire Ascetics] from the chests
steps.6c4ajwy9: Drop out the hole at the end of the room, get the @wilted-dusk-herb[Wilted Dusk Herbs], drop down and get the @soul-of-a-great-hero and @soul-vessel
steps.ggx4njw5: Go across the courtyard, get the @large-soul-of-a-proud-knight, and go up the ladder to get the @soul-of-a-proud-knight from the corpse
steps.2j33gbh8: Go back all the way up the stairs to the roof with ballistas and drop down on to the bridge to get the @soul-of-a-brave-warrior
steps.b67jn70r: Drop down onto the roof, go to the end, drop down and examine the giant's corpse to get the @soul-of-a-giant and again to leave the memory

steps.1sgu7ly4: Travel to the @forest-of-fallen-giants[Forest of Fallen Giants / Cardinal Tower] bonfire
steps.watc4kxd: Go down the ladder, cross the bridge and head outside to the large door, and put on the @king-s-ring to open it
steps.dq70t9p5: Rest at the bonfire, go out and drop down to get the @twinkling-titanite and @fragrant-branch-of-yore, and use your feather to get back to the bonfire
steps.469myowi: Examine the tree to enter the memory. You will have about 5 minutes to complete it

u9hfrfd0.content: You can summon @benhart-of-jugo before you go through the fog gate, at the bottom of the steps

steps.pgc4cc7r: This is the third of at least three boss fights you need to summon him for and have him survive to complete his quest

steps.j3f6aa81: You can summon @captain-drummond before you go through the fog gate
steps.dk0amlfh: You can only summon one of them. The other's summon sign will vanish when you summon one of them
steps.nlxyh2bb: Go through the fog gate, avoiding the fireballs that will rain down in this area
steps.sqfu2joz: Get the @bonfire-ascetic from the corpse on the first platform on the left
steps.3id4j0ip: Move forward past the first fireball area and trigger the huge rolling head
steps.il11l6ej: Continue forward and get the @fire-seed from the platform on the left near the end

steps.391grosq: You were able to summon @benhart-of-jugo or @captain-drummond as mentioned above
steps.2eot4n93: You will get the @giant-lord-soul, @giant-s-kinship, and 75,000 souls

steps.ciq6bjzv: Get the @old-radiant-lifegem from beside the pillar and then go out the door and down the steps
steps.m603shho: Examine the giant's corpse to get the @soul-of-a-giant and again to leave the memory

steps.0xbflyu4: Travel to the @forest-of-fallen-giants[Forest of Fallen Giants / Cardinal Tower] bonfire and head down to the area beside where you first met @mild-mannered-pate
steps.m85kzabs: Examine the tree to enter the memory. You will have about 5 minutes to complete it
steps.bddj8wpt: Head forward and talk to @captain-drummond to learn the Hurrah gesture
steps.o2h7xgly: If you have already completed the @memory-of-jeigh then he will also give you the @drangleic-helm
steps.33nuk2mn: Open the door to the left and get the @smooth-silky-stone[Smooth and Silky Stone] from the chest
steps.xvucno6l: Head through the other door, watching out for the enemy that breaks through the wall, and get the @fire-seed from the corpse at the end
steps.5i1oe8pd: Go through the hole in the wall and up the ramp on the left up ahead to get a @large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier
steps.hr0srwgg: Go through the archway and run for the ladder on the right, then run across the roof, drop down at the end for the @giant-warrior-club
steps.xgr5wqii: Run to the other side of the building to the left to find a chest with a @petrified-something
steps.1zvmbmf9: Go up the ladder in the building, cross the wooden bridge, clear the roof and get the @soul-of-a-great-hero and @bonfire-ascetic
steps.65cpo6u5: Go back into the building, out the back door and get the @rouge-water from the corpse beside the steps
steps.njn2b35a: Go up the steps and get the @old-radiant-lifegem, @soul-of-a-great-hero and @torch from the corpses
steps.pnph7ayp: Examine the giant corpse to get the @soul-of-a-giant and again to leave the memory

steps.atwomdb5: Travel back to the @brightstone-cove-tseldora[Brightstone Cove Tseldora / Lower Brighstone Cove] bonfire
steps.m1wwu120: Make your way back to where you fought @the-duke-s-dear-freja
steps.vwsndpg8: Examine the formation that has appeared in the boss room
steps.4u7y78b6: Head forward and examine the dead dragon to get the @ancient-dragon-soul and again to leave the memory
steps.gxo4jgsk: Use your feather to get back to the bonfire

steps.hrpkhjqx: Make sure you have obtained the @dragon-talon from @the-pit. Note you must also have completed @black-gulch and killed the two giants before the door in @the-pit can be opened
steps.vyvlrllu: You should also have a bow and arrows in your inventory to safely activate obelisks and switches from a distance
steps.nyu2fn8o: Travel to the @black-gulch[Black Gulch / Hidden Chamber] bonfire, head through the boss room, and interact with the shrine behind the @primal-bonfire
steps.z0p7m7qo: Collect the @dragon-charm[Dragon Charms] and make your way to the first bonfire
steps.difva51u: Take the stairs to the left to find @old-growth-balm[Old Growth Balms] and a shortcut that will open later
steps.ekcim0o5: Head back to the bonfire and continue down the path
steps.l4rvwze3: Just around the corner, look left across the gap and shoot the obelisk, which will raise a platform that you can now drop down to
steps.tbur4sky: Head into the building, up the stairs, and onto the roof to find the @poisonbite-ring[Poisonbite Ring +1], and then drop back down to the main path
steps.hghjf0ur: Up ahead are more obelisks, which once activated will cause structure to rise and damage the nearby @sanctum-soldier
steps.79x5l0b9: Collect the @lifegem[Lifegems], then return the second platform to its lowered position and raise it again, jumping onto the top of it as it rises
steps.ltwsq52o: Run across to the roof and get the @dark-quartz-ring[Dark Quartz Ring +3]
steps.dlc8lk0v: Hop off the roof and look down to activate another obelisk, which will raise a platform that will allow you to get the @long-bow[Long Bow +7]
steps.9naftezu: Drop down to the path and pick up the @poison-stone
steps.k9xxcjs3: Head along the path and take the room to the left with the @corrosive-egg-parasite[Corrosive Egg Insects] and collect the @goldenfruit-balm from a body in the corner
steps.avfk62hl: Take the doorway to the left from where you entered and follow the edge of the building around, drop down to another ledge, and get the @old-growth-balm behind you
steps.o3g4ywgx: Jump across to the stairs and head back up, this time going into the other building
steps.jc67z6qg: Outside will be another obelisk, which when activated will extend a platform from the wall
steps.3birifl3: Before crossing it, drop down and pick up the @lightning-urn and head around the corner to activate another obelisk
steps.3i7zeqzh: Go back up the stairs, through the building, and across the walkway we just created to activate yet another obelisk, which will extend a platform below you
steps.gy0z856x: Drop down, make your way across to the room with more @corrosive-egg-parasite[Corrosive Egg Insects], and head upstairs to get the @elizabeth-mushroom
steps.2an9nudd: Back to the main path, head down the stairs and pick up the @poison-throwing-knife[Poison Throwing Knives] and @cracked-red-eye-orb[Cracked Red Eye Orbs] next to the @poison-statue-cluster
steps.f8q4t0dj: Continue and collect @magic-bolt from a body on the left and hit the obelisk next to it
steps.rmapyqs2: Quickly jump onto the roof of the structure that is now starting to rise and head into the building for a bonfire
steps.my1bf0i8: Head out the other doorway and drop down to a ledge with a @dried-root on a corpse
steps.fuyh1lqj: Go through the room and to the right to pick up the @sanctum-mace, then back through the room and down the hole in the floor
steps.f4uf94xp: Leave the building and head up the ramp back to the main path
steps.uriw4r9m: As you continue up the hill, shoot the obelisks that you can see and get the @lloyd-s-talisman[Lloyd's Talismans] and @twinkling-titanite
steps.ruxy2c7o: Before entering the building, go around the back side and activate the last obelisk
steps.0sz9c5rf: You should now have a series of platforms you can walk across from the bonfire to the roof of this building, accessed by the ladder inside
steps.51j46n3s: From the front of the building, look down for a platform and drop down to it
steps.blqyswdx: Look around for the statues with red eyes and shoot the obelisk to raise the platform you're on
steps.vm0gy1qd: Hop off as you reach the cave but turn around and wait for the structure to reach the top to loot the @torch[Torches]
steps.6gprfxny: Go into the cave and pick up the @notched-whip[Notched Whip +7] and the @promised-walk-of-peace hex
steps.9c0dhfpe: You can choose to kill the tree in the cave for @dried-root[Dried Roots], attack it with a whip to restore durability to your items, or attack it with the curved sword @eleum-loyce to steal health
steps.1fwqvj5e: Return to the bonfire, either by backtracking or using a @homeward-bone or @aged-feather
steps.obozflqd: Lower the first platform, drop onto it, and jump to the platform on the left for @darknight-stone[Darknight Stones]
steps.kg7z7lnn: Shoot the obelisk with an arrow and jump to the middle level as it rises to get the @thunder-quartz-ring[Thunder Quartz Ring +3]
steps.81yp69qp: Hit the obelisk that controls the third platform, jump onto it, and hit it again to return to the bonfire
steps.6wotfarw: Drop down to the bottommost level and make your way down the stairs and across the bridge, and get the @rusted-coin[Rusted Coins] from the building straight ahead
steps.kkddjyty: Roll through the pots and head around to the back of the building for the @focus-souls sorcery

steps.vw3ah0gq: Head across the bridge and into the tunnel, past the first locked door, and hit the wall switch next to another door to get a @soul-of-a-great-hero and @dragon-charm
steps.1js4vpio: Go through the doorway on the opposite side and hop down into a room with some altars
steps.v83t678k: Watch out for the ghostly @sanctum-knight[Sanctum Knights] and quickly destroy the glowing bodies on the altars so that the enemies become corporeal, then deal with of them
steps.zlpwijej: Open the chests for @old-growth-balm[Old Growth Balms], a @titanite-slab, a @soul-vessel, @destructive-greatarrow, and the @catarina-helm
steps.ha4kgpig: Head into the next room and get @dried-root[Dried Roots] from the trapped chest
steps.p816rwb4: Activate the switch on the ceiling using a bow and get @twinkling-titanite and @petrified-dragon-bone[Petrified Dragon Bones] from the chest that is revealed
steps.cyrl4a1y: Drop down into and clear the room with the @sanctum-priestess, pick up the @human-effigy from the corpse, then activate the floor switch to rotate the contraption until you can walk through
steps.xsk6kths: Go down the narrow hallway and get the @repair-powder from the alcove on the left
steps.eiwuv8if: Jump over the hole in the floor and head down to the tiny window in the wall, inside which is a distant switch for you to activate
steps.zwd7fc2c: Continue past the revealed passage and shoot another switch high up on the wall straight ahead
steps.juuu23ph: Go back and enter the passage, but be mindful of the small pressure plate on the floor just before the stairs, which triggers spikes to come out of the walls along the staircase, then grab the @soul-of-a-hero and @human-effigy
steps.ifwxem55: Open the chests at the bottom for @boltstone[Boltstones], @bleed-stone[Bleed Stones], @twinkling-titanite, @petrified-dragon-bone[Petrified Dragon Bones], and the @puzzling-stone-sword
steps.1j1iaqje: Go back to the hole in the hallway floor, drop down, and head right
steps.plvh74tu: Take out as many of the @corrosive-egg-parasite[Corrosive Egg Insects] and their eggs as you can from here, then drop down
steps.ziwz9xzl: Loot the area for @dung-pie[Dung Pies], @lifegem[Lifegems], and @old-growth-balm[Old Growth Balms]
steps.3ompluan: Go up the stairs, grab the @poison-throwing-knife[Poison Throwing Knives], climb up the ladder, and get @flynn-s-ring from the chest
steps.1hg5lub3: Drop down the hole, go back to the hallway, drop down the hole in the stairs again, and head right
steps.lpeqihko: There are many more ghostly @sanctum-knight[Sanctum Knights] in this area, so keep your guard up
steps.wc76zf6e: Avoiding the spikes in the floor, hug the right wall and go through the doorway, then take a left and go up the ladder to deal with the @sanctum-priestess
steps.tppvd334: Activate the switch on the ceiling to the left to lower the spikes, then drop down to the right and look for the set of stairs going down
steps.lhqzxxif: Go down a short distance and turn back to find and activate a switch high up on the wall
steps.g3ousjdw: Head back up and around to the ladder, then jump across the gap through the door that is now open, light the bonfire, and pick up the @sanctum-crossbow around the corner
steps.e83iwexv: Jump back across the gap and continue across the bridge where another @sanctum-priestess is waiting
steps.kcl5fpzs: Hit the switch to open a shortcut and open the trapped chest for @lloyd-s-talisman[Lloyd's Talismans], avoiding the ethereal @sanctum-knight as much as possible
steps.wjfa0u09: Go across the short bridge and down the stairs to a room with several ghostly @sanctum-knight[Sanctum Knights] and glowing bodies lining the walls
steps.32061mvk: Make your way around the room, destroying all the bodies as you go, and kill the @sanctum-knight[Sanctum Knights] once they become corporeal
steps.m2rfauig: Once the room is clear, pick up the @eternal-sanctum-key and a @sanctum-knight-helm, then head back up the stairs
steps.u4oulna0: Drop down to the right and get the @bloodbite-ring[Bloodbite Ring +1] from the chest
steps.e57ied5u: Drop to the main level and go around to loot @torch[Torches], @twinkling-titanite, @holy-water-urn[Holy Water Urns], and a @human-effigy
steps.h3o4n048: Look for a switch on one of the bridge supports and activate it to reveal a room near the ladder, inside which is a chest holding the @dragon-stone
steps.rbsm8usb: Climb the ladder and look through the opening on the spinning contraption to find another switch you can activate with your bow
steps.b8p6fgyq: Drop down and shoot it again through the smaller hole, then climb back up the ladder and shoot it one more time
steps.2a25omfj: Head through and get the @denial miracle from the chest
steps.777ggn33: Leave the room and head towards the stairs down, keep going to get the @old-growth-balm, and down more stairs where eventually @jester-thomas will invade
steps.9qdj4x1u: After dealing with him, head through the fog gate and follow the right wall
steps.n6hgx9ob: Kill the first @sanctum-dragon[Imperfect] and pick up the @petrified-dragon-bone[Petrified Dragon Bones] just past it
steps.f8cn89te: Continue around the right to reach the bonfire, then carefully clear the area to loot @human-effigy[Human Effigies], @dried-root[Dried Roots], and a @soul-of-a-great-hero
steps.6jpbwl5y: Head out of the water to a stone structure with a circular object on top of it, and insert the @dragon-stone to raise a bridge
steps.ew6zcowe: Go inside the nearby room and hit the obelisk to activate the elevator, but before using it head out the other door and up the path for the @drakeblood-greatsword
steps.iirrf9v8: Return to the elevator and ride it up, then take the second elevator up for a shortcut to the first bonfire in @shulva-sanctum-city
steps.s6bikp5a: Go back down the elevator and outside, grab the @human-effigy, and go up the stairs to enter @dragon-s-rest

steps.69nui07c: Once inside, drop down the broken staircase and go through the door
steps.bsbbcz80: Drop down to the bridge on the right, then again from the far end, and heap up into the room straight ahead
steps.l8fzrc97: Deal with the @drakeblood-knight, then activate the switch on the right until the large circle is on top, releasing four @crystal-lizard[Crystal Lizards] into the room
steps.xqt0kxnz: The room on the left is empty except for a @sanctum-knight and can be ignored
steps.052dbb5r: Head out of the room and take a right, at the end take a left and drop down two platforms, then take the stairs to the other side
steps.kpqw7u52: Stay along the right wall and pick up @hexing-urn[Hexing Urns] from a corpse
steps.7k6mjft4: Continue to find another @drakeblood-knight, then go down the broken stairs
steps.aq71hh2o: Head to the outer edge and take a left, take another left at the end, and find the hidden bonfire behind an illusory wall halfway along the left wall
steps.flkh75zj: Go down the stairs and deal with two @drakeblood-knight[Drakeblood Knights], then keep following the left wall until you reach a room with empty chests and a corpse with the @drakeblood-set
steps.cxobvm9c: Head back up the stairs, past the bonfire, and find a broken bridge on the left
steps.v0290apv: Make your way down a series of drops until you see an area you can jump to on the left
steps.l8dveekd: Jump across and head right, pick up the @vine-balm, and deal with the last two @drakeblood-knight[Drakeblood Knights]
steps.xbqvky5c: Pick up the @twinkling-titanite, @large-soul-of-a-brave-warrior, and @small-smooth-silky-stone[Small Smooth and Silky Stones], then head back to the edge and make your way to the bottom of the area

zpek73y5.content: Go through the fog gate and kill @elana-the-squalid-queen

steps.vwkw0six: You may summon @steelheart-ellie next to the fog gate
steps.q4gqo2xe: You may also summon @benhart-of-jugo near the back of the room
steps.6y591ef8: She will randomly summon @skeleton[skeletons], @velstadt-the-royal-aegis[Velstadt, the Royal Aegis], or @enslaved-pig throughout the fight
steps.nlnt5n26: You will get the @soul-of-elana-squalid-queen and 72,000 souls
steps.40ne0343: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 18,000 souls each time

steps.omzv36kr: Go through the passage and light the bonfire
steps.rljoey2d: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need, then travel back to the @dragon-s-rest[Dragon's Rest / Sanctum Nadir] bonfire

8w12w8rw.content: Go through the fog gate and kill the @sinh-the-slumbering-dragon boss

steps.bjwyotod: You may summon @transendent-edde[Transcendant Edde] next to the bonfire
steps.4bjm94at: You may also summon @abbess-feeva closer to the fog gate
steps.xsftyhc8: Sinh's skin is corrosive, so bring multiple weapons, @repair-powder, the @repair sorcery, or @bracing-knuckle-ring[Bracing Knuckle Ring +2]
steps.q6woupza: You will get the @soul-of-sinh-the-slumbering-dragon and 96,000 souls
steps.xajyhaq4: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 24,000 souls each time

steps.lz1wsio3: Examine the glowing orb to get the @crown-of-the-sunken-king
steps.gxhr79so: Pick up @yorgh-s-ring from a corpse in the area
steps.miy9vmmx: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need, then travel to the @dragon-s-rest[Shulva, Sanctum City / Tower of Prayer] bonfire

steps.clvcqkls: Drop to the lowest level, cross both bridges, and use the @eternal-sanctum-key to open the locked door from earlier
steps.p9d4ydsp: Watch out for the @sanctum-priestess[Sanctum Priestesses], then open the chests for @dried-root[Dried Roots], the @lightning-clutch-ring, and @bonfire-ascetic[Bonfire Ascetics]
steps.vprt2878: Climb the ladder and the next, deal with the @corrosive-egg-parasite[Corrosive Egg Insect] ambush, then climb the third ladder
steps.dmqojsb9: Get the @sanctum-shield from the chest, then head back down the ladder and cross the bridge
steps.nethxmm6: At the end of the bridge, deal with the invader @rockshield-baldyr then light the bonfire
steps.mzc76yzj: You may also want to light a torch as the next area is quite dark and there are several sconces you can light to find your way easier
steps.0jnf524d: Hit the obelisk to activate the elevator, then head through the cave, through the fog gate, and drop down
steps.nw8d46i7: This area is made easier with a phantom or two, so consider summoning other players or the NPCs, @rapacious-andrei and @ruined-aflis[Ruined Alfis], from this room
steps.7drttk1j: Drop down and make your way into a room with a few petrifying statues and @sanctum-soldier
steps.cuhd69cp: After clearing this level, look down the holes and eliminate as many enemies as you can from here before dropping down
steps.wgyaf5ev: There are many more petrifying statues, @sanctum-soldier, and a few @petrifying-statue-cluster down here so move slowly so as to not over-aggro
steps.jq3bojbp: Once the threats are dealt with, grab the @petrified-something[Petrified Somethings] from a chest and @brightbug[Brightbugs] and @bonfire-ascetic[Bonfire Ascetics] from corpses
steps.qf92ggzp: There is only one exit out, so take the one-way drop once you've picked up all of the loot
steps.reckv1hn: Down here are a few more petrifying statues, @sanctum-soldier, and @petrifying-statue-cluster, so deal with them as before, but be cautious of the @razorback-nightcrawler that pops out of the wall halfway through
steps.ttqxih2b: Go through the fog gate and kill the @afflicted-graverobber-ancient-soldier-varg-cerah-the-old-exp[Graverobber, Varg, and Cerah] boss
steps.96jdq043: Head to the side opposite the entrance, past the petrifying statues, to find a chest containing the @flower-skirt and a corpse with @blackweed-balm[Blackweed Balms]
steps.t1w0ajiq: Drop down the hole, head right, and traverse the ledge until you come to another room with a chest containing the @dark-greatsword hex
steps.risa349s: Go back the other direction to find a corpse with @torch[Torches]
steps.iqr42ohi: Carefully jump to the platform and drop down to the bridge, take the elevator up, and arrive back at the bonfire
steps.m73k6w81: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need

steps.jj03fqnj: Make sure you have obtained the @heavy-iron-key from the @flame-salamander pit in @forest-of-fallen-giants and completed @iron-keep
steps.kagay1if: Travel to the @iron-keep[Iron Keep / Eygil's Idol] bonfire and go through the boss room, past the primal bonfire, and examine the serpent shrine
steps.614aiabf: Go up the stairs and use the @heavy-iron-key to open the door and ride the elevator up
steps.unocq8t4: Go through the fog gate and follow the stairs up, grab the @smelter-wedge[Smelter Wedges] from the deactivated @ashen-idol, and cross the long chain to reach the bonfire
steps.j11udfm1: Before continuing into the next area, prepare to meet your first active @ashen-idol with an ability similar to the @outcry pyromancy
steps.ciu1hgtv: Since this idol poses little threat, it can be safely skipped until the end to make optimum usage of the limited @smelter-wedge[Smelter Wedges]
steps.yxnf18tj: Head into the area, avoiding the flame attacks, and take the stairs down on the left side to find the @dexterity-ring
steps.hvj2cl2m: Go back up and take the doorway on the right, follow the stairs down, and drop down the platforms to get @old-growth-balm[Old Growth Balms]
