steps.ql079yc0: Drop down and head out the door, and beware of the @ashen-warrior[Ashen Warriors] that will pop out of the ash throughout the entire level
steps.od8apk7n: Grab the @twilight-herb[Twilight Herbs] off the corpse and walk through all of the ashen figures to find a @large-soul-of-a-proud-knight
steps.32n3uocl: Go to the stairs and drop down the right side for a @rouge-water
steps.hsmr6uy1: Enter the doorway, descend the ladder, and walk around the pillar to get a @blackweed-balm
steps.phl6qwv9: Go down the next ladder, pick up the @scythe[Scythe +7], head through the doorway, and get the @prism-stone[Prism Stones] from the corpse
steps.vx0y9t37: Head around the corner and open the chest for a @titanite-slab, then head back out the door and drop down to the lower ledge
steps.y58k792b: Deal with the @possessed-armor and go around the corner for a chest with @human-effigy[Human Effigies] and a @bonfire-ascetic
steps.ipzrmu43: Head back around and drop into the room with the @ashen-idol, then quickly use a @smelter-wedge to prevent it from buffing the @ashen-warrior[Ashen Warriors]
steps.ogvi8b7g: Go into the room near the ladder and get the @dance-of-fire pyromancy from the chest
steps.hnh7yoly: Head back and use the lever to open the giant door, then go outside to the left
steps.yp3avo3p: Destroy the ashen figures for @old-mundane-stone, pick up the @lloyd-s-talisman[Lloyd's Talismans] from the corpse, and open the obvious illusory wall
steps.ojxb6dxa: Loot the chests for @old-radiant-lifegem[Old Radiant Lifegems], @wilted-dusk-herb[Wilted Dusk Herbs], and @soul-vessel[Soul Vessels], then head back up the path and go through the door on the right
steps.26j28u8w: Mind the barrels as most if not all of them are explosive, which can be used to your advantage if you have @fire-arrow or other means of igniting them safely
steps.81ct25n4: Kill the @possessed-armor and pick up the @goldenfruit-balm
steps.db2714i9: Head outside, down two ladders, and open the chest for a @caestus[Caestus +8]
steps.nf3zo5kd: Go through the doorway and to the right to find a bonfire
steps.0he1es0e: Continue past it for a locked door and a chest to the left with @twinkling-titanite
steps.qgb3lkxt: Head back the other direction and pass through a fog gate to a circular room
steps.5275l0j8: Take a left and go down the ladder, but do not kill the @cask-runner
steps.ykp21iic: Instead, walk into him to push him through the trapdoor and into the lower room
steps.r93v0wzu: Follow the path around to the left and attack the locked door a few times until the barrel blocking it breaks, then go through and kill the @ashen-warrior
steps.kyqv2oxc: Head back the other direction through another door to a room with more @cask-runner[Cask Runners] and many explosive barrels
steps.sj4v8p19: Herd the @cask-runner[Cask Runners] through the trapdoor and pick up the @radiant-lifegem from the corpse
steps.7gd4c8mh: Descend halfway down the ladder then climb back up to lure the @ashen-warrior[Ashen Warriors] and @iron-warrior over
steps.78mmqc3i: If the @iron-warrior doesn't ignite the @cask-runner[Cask Runners] himself, use ranged fire attacks to blow up as many enemies as possible, then descend and clean up the rest
steps.dmuwkxfk: Pick up the @flame-quartz-ring[Flame Quartz Ring +3] and disable the enemy-buffing @ashen-idol for the @soul-of-nadalia-bride-of-ash Fragment
steps.wnjroxec: Pull the lever to open the door and loot the corpses for @twinkling-titanite, @human-effigy, @large-titanite-shard[Large Titanite Shards], and @dried-root
steps.h3xtt5sm: Continue around the path, watching out for the @fume-sorcerer[Fume Sorcerers] and the ambush from behind
steps.lix3blvq: Pick up the @human-effigy from the corpse, then take the ladder down
steps.qvsv4fzk: Head to the open area and destroy all of the ashen figures for @large-soul-of-a-proud-knight, @soul-of-a-hero, and @soul-of-a-great-hero
steps.b2izy53k: Go back past the ladder, through the fog gate, and follow the path to the right until you reach an open doorway with a bonfire
steps.4jewojzh: Return to where the fog gate was, take the stairs down, and grab a @raw-stone from a corpse on the left
steps.4ikb9lik: Before going through this next area, you might want to have either the @black-witch-veil or the @hollow-skin from later in the level, as the tower has an @ashen-idol that emits @curse
steps.13a2etic: Once ready, cross the giant chain and prepare to be invaded by @maldron-the-assassin, who will be hiding just around the corner
steps.ems0w2yq: When he gets to 50% health he will run down into the tower, but before following grab @bonfire-ascetic[Bonfire Ascetics] from the chest
steps.on91h9bh: Go down the stairs and disable the @ashen-idol near the bottom to stop it from applying @curse, buffing the enemies, and reviving the @possessed-armor
steps.6k0w4xkz: Don't forget to pick up the @soul-of-nadalia-bride-of-ash Fragment
steps.u8845afl: Head back up and get @silver-talisman[Silver Talismans] from a corpse on the stairs, then drop onto a center platform for @alonne-greatbow[Alonne Greatbow +5]
steps.bbsc08vc: At the bottom, loot the @majestic-greatsword from the chest and @palestone[Palestones] from an ashen figure, then head all the way back to the bonfire
steps.t4wwmqc1: Grab the @spell-quartz-ring[Spell Quartz Ring +3] from the circular room, then go down the hallway and get @magic-stone[Magic Stones]
steps.12642vir: Descend the ladder and pull the switch to open the first gate, then go down the hallway with the @fume-sorcerer
steps.c2fy43uo: Continue around and deal with the other two @fume-sorcerer[Fume Sorcerers] before opening the second gate
steps.hx0fq9r7: Hit the flaming head to send it to the other end of the hallway, then herd @cask-runner[Cask Runners] into the hallway towards the two cracked walls and use fire to blow them up
steps.zyc9ayne: One room has @petrified-dragon-bone[Petrified Dragon Bones] and the other @catarina-gauntlets and @catarina-leggings
steps.5gccelsq: Continue around to find an @iron-warrior waiting, then lead him back around into the large room with explosive barrels and use them to your advantage
steps.3b9736i0: Open the last two gates, then head through the archway to the left, climb the ladder, and pull the lever to open a shortcut to the bonfire
steps.jioyz6l2: Go back down the ladder, across the chain, and through the fog gate
steps.l8edtiqn: This area is filled with @scorcher[Scorchers], which are killed most efficiently by igniting them and getting close enough to trigger their self-destruct
steps.pa2x0sj6: Pick up the @petrified-dragon-bone[Petrified Dragon Bones], then go down the ladder and deal with the invader @quicksword-rachel
steps.fjlp9te2: There is a @dried-root on a ledge halfway down the ladder that can be reached by careful falls and jumps
steps.qmz2kyo8: Open the doors at the bottom to find @twinkling-titanite, the @recollection hex, and a ladder
steps.5k0fgo6v: Take the ladder down, follow the path around, and open the doors on the left to a room full of @scorcher[Scorchers]
steps.uws2du91: After dealing with them, pick up the @scorching-iron-scepter from the altar, leave through the other door
steps.8rtqv532: Pull the lever to call the elevator, ride it up, follow the path, and drop down to arrive back at the beginning
steps.4mxgsyd0: Return to the bonfire, head out to the circular room, and use the @scorching-iron-scepter on the stone mechanism to activate the elevators and opening several new paths
steps.v41q1dz0: Take the elevator up, then the next up as well and search the back wall as it ascends for an illusory wall, behind which is a room with the @hollow-skin
steps.n04nbmy5: Get back on the elevator and ride it all the way up, then take the path to the right
steps.m832f8na: Open the door, deal with the @possessed-armor, and pick up the @lacerating-knife[Lacerating Knives]
steps.r8l41zc6: Go upstairs for two more @possessed-armor[Possessed Armors] and two @ashen-warrior[Ashen Warriors]
steps.t1gj2t94: Once they are dealt with, lead one of the @cask-runner[Cask Runners] to the cracked wall, use fire to cause it to explode, and pick up the @dispelling-ring[Dispelling Ring +1]
steps.23d4ap1r: Open the chest in the last alcove for four more @smelter-wedge[Smelter Wedges], then drop down and take the elevator down
steps.x24u4kvx: Go around the edge and cross the gap to reach an iron door
steps.q183249x: Inside is an @iron-warrior being healed by an @ashen-idol, so either kill the @iron-warrior quickly or run past it to the glowing door to disable the @ashen-idol[Ashen Idol's] effect first
steps.y84jfoc3: Open the chest for the @life-ring[Life Ring +3] and the doors for @titanite-shard[Titanite Shards], a @broadsword[Broadsword +7], a @petrified-something, and @flame-butterfly[Flame Butterflies]
steps.88am5sab: Destroy the boxes in the last room on the right for @titanite-chunk[Titanite Chunks] and a @titanite-slab
steps.h3h95rci: Go back out and take this elevator up to a hallway
steps.gt3bugc7: Take out the two @possessed-armor[Possessed Armors] in this room and get the @old-radiant-lifegem from the fire if you have enough healing and/or fire defense
steps.4pgcvrli: Open the first door for a shortcut to the second bonfire, then open the other door to pick up the @simpleton-s-ring
steps.zbv6ki17: Go back to the elevator, take it down, and as it starts going back up, run off of it to land on the narrow ledge with a chest containing the @pilgrim-s-spontoon, then drop down twice to return to the main level
steps.17w8w91g: Take the elevator up and jump for the walkway with vertical bars, kill the @crystal-lizard around the corner, and open the chest for @brightbug[Brightbugs]
steps.5vdwvbi2: Go back to the elevator and take it back down to the main level again, return to the bonfire if needed, and take the elevator down
steps.5cspm8pz: Follow the ledge around and go through a room with flame jets to an ashen field, out of which will spawn three @iron-warrior[Iron Warriors], so take it slow here
steps.s9k45f87: Destroy all of the ashen figures for @titanite-chunk[Titanite Chunks], @twinkling-titanite, @skeptic-s-spice, @wilted-dusk-herb[Wilted Dusk Herbs], @human-effigy[Human Effigies], and @charcoal-pine-resin[Charcoal Pine Resins]
steps.15jxuek4: Grab the @tower-key off of the corpse near the cliff, then head back to the elevator room and take the next one down
steps.y9ganzwx: Hop off to the top level bridge before it reaches the bottom and get the @strength-ring from the chest
steps.23ah0lv3: Make your way down the levels and be careful not to fall more than one level at a time, grabbing the @partizan[Partizan +6] from a corpse as you go
steps.r6qxz7kz: Deal with the @iron-warrior at the bottom and open the door, then make your way across the bridge
steps.xg402vi0: The @possessed-armor[Possessed Armors] here cannot be killed yet as there is a nearby @ashen-idol reviving them, so just run past
steps.1y1n1pm2: In the right room is a chest with the @sorcery-clutch-ring, and in the left is and elevator down
steps.mwbcf0gq: At the bottom of the elevator, stick to the right side and quickly run to the room on the far end to light the bonfire
steps.kqfxywe1: Make your way around this area and disable all four @ashen-idol[Ashen Idols] to prevent them healing the enemies and boss
steps.yqmg454h: Go through the fog gate and kill the @fume-knight boss
steps.ujpcuibb: Go through the doorway at the back of the room to pick up the @crown-of-the-old-iron-king, then return to the bonfire
steps.txld5iu6: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need, then travel to the @brume-tower[Brume Tower / Foyer] bonfire
steps.9oqmpucf: Go out and to the left and unlock the door with the @tower-key
steps.uaylcf7q: This area has an @ashen-idol that emits @curse, so make sure to equip your @black-witch-veil or @hollow-skin
steps.24r5le6c: It also revives the @possessed-armor, so quickly go all the way down the stairs, take a left, and open the glowing door to destroy the @ashen-idol
steps.odealb6q: Loot the area for the @fire-snake pyromancy, @large-titanite-shard[Large Titanite Shards], and @old-radiant-lifegem[Old Radiant Lifegems], then head back to the bonfire

memory-of-the-old-iron-king.name: Memory of the Old Iron King

steps.5qhqps1a: Make sure you have the @ashen-mist-heart and @crown-of-the-old-iron-king or this area won't be accessible yet
steps.hksutz9n: From the @brume-tower[Brume Tower / Foyer] bonfire, take the elevator up, then the next, then take a left to unlock the door and a third elevator
steps.z4la0yu4: At the top will be the @prowlers, a total of five red phantoms, made more difficult by the @ashen-idol healing them, so take that out first
steps.so7mqb3s: Go up the stairs and light the bonfire, then examine the glowing armor to be transported to the memory
steps.dhpv8rbj: This area is made easier with a phantom or two, so consider summoning other players or the NPCs, @drifter-swordsman-aidel and @steel-willed-lorrie, from this room
steps.cryawlsy: Deal with the numerous @alonne-knight-memory-of-the-old-iron-king[Alonne Knights] while avoiding the @flame-salamander attacks
steps.e0lq05zh: Use the doorways near the @flame-salamander[Flame Salamanders] to get behind them for easy kills
steps.6m8avpuf: Loot the bodies in the large room for @smooth-silky-stone[Small Smooth and Silky Stones], @human-effigy[Human Effigies], and a @skeptic-s-spice, and get the @rusted-coin[Rusted Coins] from the first doorway to the left
steps.q9qmknoi: At the far end of the room, drop down the hole in front of the @flame-salamander and continue around
steps.3b7jatig: Beware the @flame-salamander[Flame Salamanders] below that can damage you through the grated floor as you deal with the @alonne-knight-memory-of-the-old-iron-king[Alonne Knights]
steps.6ihz0n2i: Take the stairs on the right down, take a right, and get the @twinblade[Twinblade +7] off a corpse
steps.rizwtayx: Drop down the small ledge and take the right door just in front of the @flame-salamander to circle around behind it and kill it
steps.7sux5fo0: Hop down and go through the door on the right for the stairs leading back up
steps.ldwy7qgm: Loot the remaining corpses for @repair-powder and @radiant-lifegem[Radiant Lifegems]
steps.e1emh4pd: Go through the fog gate and kill the @sir-alonne boss
steps.gh4bx2y3: Go through the door and examine the chair to receive the final @smelter-wedge, then again to leave the memory
steps.nkmr9uk0: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need, then travel to the @brume-tower[Brume Tower / Throne Floor] bonfire
steps.4rnw0elb: Jump across to the elevator and get the @baneful-bird-ring, go disable the nearby @ashen-idol, and pick up the last @soul-of-nadalia-bride-of-ash Fragment
steps.bns16mpc: The 12 fragments will now combine to form the True @soul-of-nadalia-bride-of-ash
steps.dqrylmct: Head back to the bonfire and travel to the @brume-tower[Brume Tower / Foyer] bonfire

steps.o3lxdzmt: From the @brume-tower[Brume Tower / Foyer] bonfire, take the elevator down and open the door using the @tower-key
steps.rnr0q2nb: Follow the stairs, grab the @twilight-herb, take the elevator down, go through the tunnel to reach the bonfire, and drop down into the next room
steps.63akj76a: This area is made easier with a phantom or two, so consider summoning other players or the NPCs, @drifter-swordsman-aidel and @steel-willed-lorrie, from this room
steps.4kntcwps: Head to the next room and pull the lever to release the @ashen-warrior[Ashen Warriors] from their cells, then pick up @large-titanite-shard[Large Titanite Shards]
steps.o3i62x7l: Unfortunately the gate on the far end is on a timer and will be closed by this point, and since the lever can only be used once, head back to the bonfire using your @homeward-bone / @aged-feather to reset it
steps.a8js4zvk: Pull the lever again but this time rush through the enemies and dodge as necessary to avoid the @flame-salamander[Flame Salamander's] attacks, and drop down at the far end before the gate closes
steps.cp1sm2kq: Deal with the @astrologist then go through the hole on the left, but do not drop down the ledge
steps.7k23m3q4: Grab the @crimson-water from the end and head back into the cave to take the other path
steps.79mxtrii: There is another lever here similar to before, so pull it to open the cells, deal with the enemies, and grab the @simpleton-s-spice and @torch[Torches] from the cells
steps.5yjkxnff: Return to the bonfire and make your way back here, but this time after pulling the lever, rush through same as before to reach the next room before the gate closes
steps.ycqx47fv: Take the right path, drop down, and kill the @possessed-armor to reach the @old-growth-balm[Old Growth Balms] and @cracked-red-eye-orb[Cracked Red Eye Orbs]
steps.t28s5e9h: Drop down to the upper ledge on the left to deal with the @astrologist, then drop down again for the @dried-root
steps.spu5n81v: Return to the bonfire if you plan on summoning the NPCs, otherwise continue to the boss and go back for the last loot later
steps.gtwxt93t: Ignore the lever this time and take the left path instead
steps.exfjm3aa: Stay on the upper ledge and get the @wilted-dusk-herb[Wilted Dusk Herbs] from behind the @possessed-armor, then make your way through the rest of the level
steps.30d1s0n0: Go through the fog gate and kill the @smelter-demon-iron-king-dlc[Smelter Demon] boss
steps.yb2i2k10: Go through the tunnel and grab the @pharros-mask from the corpse, then take the elevator and follow the path to return to the bonfire
steps.l5qlkrct: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need

steps.8pnh904y: Make sure you have obtained the @frozen-flower from @drangleic-castle
steps.pubw49cp: Travel to the @shaded-woods[Shaded Woods / Ruined Fork Road] bonfire, take the middle path to the @shrine-of-winter, and examine the serpent shrine
steps.g59rhu04: Head through the door, up the stairs, and light the bonfire
steps.5o7rny0l: This area is currently plagued by a blizzard and much is covered in ice, blocking paths and trapping items until the first boss is defeated. However, the boss is invisible until you pick up the @eye-of-the-priestess, so the first task is obtaining that
steps.yt2dnf18: Proceed forward through the door and take a right, and in the first room grab the @radiant-lifegem[Radiant Lifegems] from a corpse
steps.hd3ijf5m: Head down and outside, cross the bridge, and grab the @goldenfruit-balm from a corpse
steps.2afosvmo: The @retainer[Retainers] remain passive until you clear the blizzard, so ignore or kill as you please
steps.yslu2nl0: Down in the courtyard is a corpse with @winged-spear[Winged Spear +7], and to the left of the second stairs are some @torch[Torches]
steps.4z8kg9ca: Go through the alley, past the fountain and a @spellsword, and grab the @small-blue-burr[Small Blue Burrs] through the archway to the left
steps.eakd1rv0: Ignore the bridge for now and head up the stairs and into the building
steps.tvzmtl2c: Go through the doorway and up the stairs to the roof, drop off through the broken section to find @monastery-charm[Monastery Charms] and the @dark-clutch-ring, then go back into the building
steps.hoo44hf3: Take a left and head outside, up the stairs, and through the door on the left
steps.2cotgvf3: Break the crates and follow the path to find the @old-bell-helm
steps.8fksliwg: Return to take the other door and drop down to light the bonfire
steps.7vbhx9hs: Go outside and take a right at the tree to find @ring-of-the-embedded on the snowdrift
steps.65d1vhg6: Do not drop down to the fountain area but circle around the building to get the @dark-dance hex
steps.5qlydbt8: Head up the stairs and deal with the @rampart-golem on the bridge, pick up the @radiant-lifegem[Radiant Lifegems] from the corpse, then open the giant doors with the lever
steps.p6nobk18: Go up the stairs on the right, cross the bridge, and watch out for the invisible @wall-watchman[Wall Watchmen] who like to fire the ballistae at you
steps.1h7ig7g2: Head through the building on the left and cross the bridge, go through the doorway on the left blocked by an @ice-golem, and pull the lever to summon an unfortunately unusable elevator that was blocking loot earlier
steps.55wkroh1: Go up the stairs and past the door to find an invisible ladder with a chest containing @splintering-lightning-spear at the top
steps.8nw478d5: Jump the gap in the ramp down and get @soul-of-a-great-hero from outside, then continue to the bottom of the tower for a @human-effigy
steps.bd21v3rv: Head out and down the stairs for a @crimson-water, then outside across the bridge and up the stairs for the @eye-of-the-priestess
steps.ee9nk708: Continue down the path to find a @wall-watchman who is now visible
steps.ks3ipiqb: Keep following the path, grab @alluring-skull[Alluring Skulls] and a @skeptic-s-spice, and go through the fog gate to find a bonfire
steps.ywpxy6b3: Travel to the @shaded-woods[Frozen Eleum Loyce / Outer Wall] bonfire
steps.ebhcfohb: Head through the door and to the left this time
steps.nagno4qb: Go through the fog gate and kill the @aava-the-king-s-pet boss
steps.xyuoe4q2: Continue up the winding stairs and into the cathedral to find a bonfire
steps.x1d9o47h: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need
steps.dgjizx25: Travel back to the @grand-cathedral bonfire and proceed forward through the doors and up the carpeted stairs to speak with @alsanna-silent-oracle
steps.l14obcw3: Agree to help her and she will stop the blizzard, unfreezing everything caught within it
steps.foa9mwzj: Head through the large archway straight ahead and @alsanna-silent-oracle will speak of the @loyce-knight[Loyce Knights] who have not returned
steps.vopnkixt: Because there is work yet to do, head back the way you came and open the chest for the @vessel-shield
steps.c9kivil9: Travel to the @shaded-woods[Frozen Eleum Loyce / Outer Wall] bonfire, then go through the door and right to proceed through the now-unfrozen area for more items
steps.5ydmab0u: Down the first set of stairs, go into the room that before had rubble obstructing it and grab the @soul-flash sorcery from the chest
steps.ej3a475q: Take the ladder up for the @northwarder-set then head back out and along the route
steps.q9xkipud: Remember that the @retainer[Retainers] will attack now, often after you pass to catch you off guard
steps.elmc2oi7: In the alley, grab @dried-root, @retainer-staff, and @goldenfruit-balm[Goldfruit Balms] from the trio of corpses
steps.caexsmjt: Pick up @repair-powder[Repair Powders] near the fountain, then continue to the bridge and use the elevator
steps.y4jboxze: Be careful around the @ice-rat as they will shred your stamina and health, and pick up the @monastery-charm[Monastery Charms]
steps.e31vua1q: Get @twilight-herb[Twilight Herbs] from a corpse and continue forward to get invaded by @hexer-nicholai
steps.daiyzy2z: Pick up @old-growth-balm[Old Growth Balms] and @amber-herb[Amber Herbs] from corpses in the area
steps.b6733h8e: Take the ladder up, open the chest for @boltstone[Boltstones], then go around the building, past the door, and across a bridge
steps.0dwnftyr: Grab @magic-stone[Magic Stones] from the corpse and go into the building to light the bonfire
steps.wh89xxnc: Head back across the bridge and into the other building, then up the stairs to find a white phantom waiting for you
steps.jxtseu4a: Don't be fooled though, this is actually @maldron-the-assassin in disguise, so kill him now to avoid a very nasty backstab later
steps.ct9s05l6: He will run away at some point, so chase him down so that he doesn't follow into the next area
steps.5x4qnolu: Once he's dead, continue on and pull the lever to open the door
steps.l1cr03cn: Go down the path to find a frosty @covetous-demon-ivory-king-dlc[Covetous Demon], who drops the @ivory-warrior-ring
steps.s4tgyp9g: Loot the area for @dried-root[Dried Roots], @large-club[Large Club +8], @twinkling-titanite, @crimson-water, and @smooth-silky-stone[Smooth and Silky Stones]
steps.jwkvtf00: Go through the cave and take the path on the left to open a shortcut
steps.6bea36y5: Now take the other path and be careful not to kill enemies too closely to the inactive @facsimile-giant lest they absorb the souls and overwhelm you
steps.m9gnrnjj: The golems can also be killed before being activated to make things easier
steps.rw95mehp: Grab @charcoal-pine-resin[Charcoal Pine Resins] and a @pharros-lockstone from corpses, then take the elevator up
steps.xxh1dzag: Ignore the enemies on the bridge to the left and head right up the snowy path and pick up @vine-balm from a corpse near a ledge
steps.amvyzcuw: Head up the stairs, open the door, and approach the first @loyce-knight to return him to the @grand-cathedral
steps.gy3ziwz6: Go back outside and attack the snowy boulder to roll it down to close the gap in the bridge, killing the enemies along the way
steps.mae7f5o1: The drop from here may kill you, so follow the path back down and cross the bridge, grabbing @azal-s-staff, @radiant-lifegem[Radiant Lifegems], and @cracked-red-eye-orb[Cracked Red Eye Orbs]
steps.3ynfz71x: Go into the building and up to the roof, then open the chests for a @soul-vessel, @sorcerer-s-twinblade, and @divine-blessing[Divine Blessings]
steps.9ame1vup: Continue towards the next bonfire but instead of dropping down, go through the narrow pass straight ahead, then use a @flame-butterfly to light the four sconces and open the door
steps.bnyxlsga: Open the obvious illusory wall to the left and follow the path to get @bone-fist from the ledge
steps.7loducae: Deal with the @retainer[Retainers] and the @flexile-sentry-ivory-king-dlc[Flexile Sentry] and pick up the @garrison-ward-key in the back of the room
steps.844azo7j: In an alcove near the door deal with the second @flexile-sentry-ivory-king-dlc[Flexile Sentry], then follow the path up for @human-effigy[Human Effigies]
steps.6g0hjue0: Continue on to the bonfire, keep going until you cross the bridge, then take a left and open the door using the @garrison-ward-key and light the bonfire
steps.qz62h0ql: Examining the coffin will take you to @frigid-outskirts, so save that for later
steps.rmhnsyc6: Go across to the other door, kill the mimic on the far right to get @catarina-armor, then open the chests for a @titanite-slab, @old-radiant-lifegem[Old Radiant Lifegems], @bonfire-ascetic[Bonfire Ascetics], and @brightbug[Brightbugs]
steps.aig70uzw: Head out, up the stairs, and across the bridge, then take a right to get @prism-stone[Prism Stones], @goldenfruit-balm[Goldenfruit Balms], and @large-soul-of-a-brave-warrior
steps.qp0e180n: Use a @pharros-lockstone and open the wall to find a chest with @durgo-s-hat
steps.gxx5gh7h: Go back and make your way down the stairs and into the next building, and go straight across to a balcony with @priest-s-chime[Priest's Chime +8]
steps.nstmht1i: At the far end of the hall, go up the ladder to get @elizabeth-mushroom[Elizabeth Mushrooms] and open a shortcut, then head back down
steps.e3hbnh95: Take the next two ladders down and go out to a balcony to pick up the @ring-of-resistance[Ring of Resistance +1]
steps.9jm29lts: Go down the ladder and open the chest in the back room for @wilted-dusk-herb[Wilted Dusk Herbs]
steps.v4g4bg03: Head through the tunnel at the other end, follow the rampart, then use the elevator to open a shortcut door
steps.l9tibnp6: Once back down, continue along the rampart and deal with the invader @castaway-witch-donna
steps.xsa81z99: Open the door and approach the second @loyce-knight to return him to the @grand-cathedral
steps.y1565fhc: Go back up the elevator and follow the right path to the bonfire
steps.8a0mm7h7: Pull the lever to open the door, and in the next room are two inactive @facsimile-giant that will activate if allowed to absorb any souls
steps.co0oy14w: Once the room is clear, kill the mimic on the left for the @symbol-of-avarice and open the chest for @twinkling-titanite and @petrified-dragon-bone[Petrified Dragon Bones]
steps.4perlv06: Follow the stairs up, grabbing the @dried-root[Dried Roots] along the way, and get invaded by @holy-knight-aurheim, who won't be a threat until a bit later
steps.5hgkk47f: The next room has four @facsimile-giant, so pull the other enemies down the stairs to kill them so that they don't activate
steps.1rjawcu0: Now go back up and be aware that killing one giant will activate another, so aim to get all of them extremely low on health, then kill them simultaneously
steps.kc5n9ul6: Open the chest they were guarding for the @curved-nil-greatsword
steps.6jcqb00n: Go up the stairs and attack all of the barrels to find @holy-knight-aurheim, who is currently disguised as one, and kill him
steps.j4re17wi: Open the chest for @silver-talisman[Silver Talismans], then head back and cross the bridge, watching out for more @facsimile-giant in the next hallway
steps.quxhs4a1: At the end, open the door and approach the third @loyce-knight to return him to the @grand-cathedral, then go up the stairs behind him to open a shortcut
steps.4ngi0n6k: Head back down, through the room where the knight was, then take a left and open an illusory wall along the right just before the corpse with @flame-butterfly[Flame Butterflies]
steps.6jnb1rea: Drop down to the bridge and go straight to find a staircase, at the top of which is a chest with the @fire-clutch-ring
steps.0511vp9n: Go back down the stairs, cross the bridge, and drop down to another bridge further along the hallway
steps.qw7p7enb: Grab the @twin-headed-greatbow from a chest at the end of the hallway to the right, then drop down and return to the bonfire
steps.ilvxusx6: Travel back to the @grand-cathedral bonfire and proceed past @alsanna-silent-oracle
steps.7girtuq9: Go through the fog gate, fall down to @the-old-chaos, and kill the @burnt-ivory-king boss
steps.pwqwdifo: Examine the glowing orb to receive the @crown-of-the-ivory-king, then examine the beam of light to teleport back to the @grand-cathedral
steps.o31dqrn2: Speak with @alsanna-silent-oracle, then optionally return to @the-old-chaos or co-op the boss to farm @loyce-soul to receive items from her
steps.6l2q5rqh: Head to the bonfire and return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need

steps.i44phs35: Travel to the @frozen-eleum-loyce[Frozen Eleum Loyce / Expulsion Chamber] bonfire, then rest in the coffin to be transported to the @frigid-outskirts
steps.f79kx089: This area will periodically be affected by a whiteout blizzard, reducing visibility to a very short distance, during which will spawn the dangerous @ice-stallion
steps.fhj00tqp: This makes navigation quite difficult, so to avoid getting lost and aggroing too many @ice-stallion, you can stand still during the blizzard and only move when it dies down
steps.2quh1ae8: Grab @blackweed-balm from one of the other coffins, then head to the circle of stones
steps.gjoiozh5: This area is made easier with a phantom or two, so consider summoning other players or the NPCs, @head-of-vengarl, @abbess-feeva, or @manhunter-o-harrah from these ruins
steps.967ssdef: Run to the first building and get a @dried-root inside and the @mirrah-hat outside
steps.m2kyhzqy: Halfway to the next building is a corpse with @lacerating-knife[Lacerating Knives]
steps.oow07vdf: Run into the next building and only use a @pharros-lockstone if you need to activate the healing water for yourself or any phantoms
steps.3bdnm0vp: Make your way towards the next building and get @twinkling-titanite from a corpse
steps.9n14w77z: Run into the next building and get @human-effigy[Human Effigies] from a corpse
steps.lo48zp0q: Head towards the cliff and look for a body on the ledge to get the @ring-of-the-living
steps.2z3adq7n: Follow the path to the left and cross the bridge, and note that no more @ice-stallion will spawn down here but they will follow if they've already spawned and spotted you elsewhere
steps.22yr903w: Go through the fog gate and kill the @lud-the-king-s-pet-zallen-the-king-s-pet[Lud & Zallen, the King's Pets] boss
steps.h5y47wcr: Examine the beam of light to teleport out
steps.r6ps0eqn: Return to @majula, level up, upgrade your weapons and armor, and buy any consumables you need

steps.kxvw6umt: Now that you have at least four @soul-of-a-giant[Souls of a Giant] the fight against @king-vendrick will be easier
steps.qnb4ip0u: Travel to the @undead-crypt[Undead Crypt / Undead Ditch] bonfire and make your way to where you fought @velstadt-the-royal-aegis

lkgmfhzw.content: Go through the fog gate and kill @king-vendrick

steps.vi1416tf: There are no NPCs to summon for this fight

steps.sfntviib: Examine the pile of armor to enter @memory-of-the-king and speak to @vendrick[King Vendrick]
steps.g47snwwo: Now that you have killed @king-vendrick travel to the @shrine-of-amana[Shrine of Amana / Crumbled Ruins] bonfire
steps.dp8ubgrb: Make sure you are in human form and go back to the submerged path ahead, chop down the vines and open the door
steps.1ns8jopo: Get the @soul-of-the-king from the chair and the @king-s-set from the chest
steps.selws9up: Use your feather to get back to the bonfire

steps.erahrekz: Travel back to the @drangleic-castle[Drangleic Castle / King's Gate] bonfire
steps.y1i0ifvm: Go out and down to the left to the door and put on the @king-s-ring to open it
steps.xm2hzk11: Talk to the @emerald-herald and continue along the path to the fog gate

5d5zybgn.content: Go through the fog gate and first kill the @throne-defender-throne-watcher[Throne Defender and Throne Watcher]

steps.ps9jka6e: You can summon @benhart-of-jugo outside the fog gate to the left
steps.4tqtfktw: This is the fourth of at least three boss fights you need to summon him for and have him survive to complete his quest
steps.d2jrgzfn: You can summon @head-of-vengarl outside the fog gate to the right
steps.t98fgnz4: You will get the @throne-defender-soul and the @throne-watcher-soul and 68,000 souls
steps.0i28ebpy: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 17,000 souls each time

steps.3fd7akvz: You must have killed the @giant-lord before she will spawn
steps.mwzkb08r: Your summons will stay with you for this fight
steps.3w37rusb: You will get the @soul-of-nashandra and 90,000 souls
steps.mvvd4qys: Optionally do some @online-matchmaking[jolly co-op] to get some extra souls. You will get 22,500 souls each time

steps.en5chj6i: You may choose to claim the throne or abandon it by walking out
steps.xcuoyr56: You will now be back at @majula, where you can finish up some final tasks before continuing to New Game Plus

2njp8a0h.content: Now that you've completed the game, @stone-trader-chloanne will sell more items

steps.ydnhho1f: You should now have all the items needed for @royal-sorcerer-navlaan, so go talk to him in @aldia-s-keep to get your rewards

lnqhtplm.content: If you have been doing @benhart-of-jugo[Benhart of Jugo's] quest then you can go talk to him in the @memory-of-orro to complete it

steps.gzueyg0h: Travel to the @forest-of-fallen-giants[Forest of Fallen Giants / Cardinal Tower] bonfire and head up to the area where you fought the @the-pursuer
steps.f4k39rjx: Go forward, talk to @benhart-of-jugo who will give you the @bluemoon-greatsword and @benhart-s-set

steps.662lua3n: It's best to save this for last due to its difficulty and the need to use @human-effigy[Human Effigies] every time
steps.wdijpvs2: Also, this guide is written so that the easiest one is last, making the @darklurker fight easier to repeat if needed, but feel free to do them in any order you prefer
steps.00kzkrvh: If you have met @darkdiver-grandahl in all three locations you can now join the @pilgrims-of-dark covenant
steps.30548uv1: Travel to the @black-gulch[Black Gulch / Hidden Chamber], go up the hill and drop off by the first worm to the ledge
steps.nih2npxe: Go in and talk to @darkdiver-grandahl, join the covenant if you haven't already, and give him a @human-effigy to open the portal

rq5ho0ol.content: Enter the portal and complete the area

steps.b7h5iahz: You will need to kill six enemies. Two heavy melee, two pyromancers, and two shades
steps.4yq2evbo: Remember to light the cauldron, using a @flame-butterfly to light your torch
steps.lur3f8pb: Drop down the mist filled hole to complete the area

steps.dfynkz83: Talk to @darkdiver-grandahl to rank up in the covenant and receive the @resonant-soul Hex
steps.sfajd3w2: Travel to the @drangleic-castle[Drangleic Castle / Under Castle Drangleic] bonfire, go out and around the corner to speak to @darkdiver-grandahl

3davkvnk.content: Give him a @human-effigy to open the portal, enter it and complete the area

steps.g2q3839c: You will need to kill four enemies. One heavy melee, two fast melee, and a shade
steps.sfn2e9ld: Be very careful not to fall of the ledges in the water
steps.jfy86xev: Remember to light the cauldron, using a @flame-butterfly to light your torch
steps.wxl98f7y: Drop down the mist filled hole to complete the area

steps.gw5flgzs: You won't rank up after the second area is complete. You need to complete all three areas to get the next rank
steps.36a8ey5t: Travel to the @shaded-woods[Shaded Woods / Shaded Ruins] bonfire and drop down the hole near the second tower

82gbe9uf.content: Give @darkdiver-grandahl a @human-effigy to open the portal, enter it and complete the area

steps.y4gkr9dn: You will need to kill four enemies. Two fast melee, one archer, and a shade
steps.hy8b903y: Remember to light the cauldron, using a @flame-butterfly to light your torch
steps.2o2k29jq: Drop down the mist filled hole to complete the area

dlg05u0y.content: When you drop down the fog gate in the third area you can kill the @darklurker

steps.hr7poc2g: There are no NPCs to summon for this fight
steps.sr7xhxtd: You will get the @darklurker-soul and 35,000 souls

steps.u0mz3cii: If you completed all areas talk to @darkdiver-grandahl to rank up and receive the @great-resonant-soul Hex
steps.e23r3ojz: If you also killed the boss talk to him to rank up and receive the @climax Hex, @xanthous-set, and @dragon-chime

steps.ic8333jx: If you missed any @crystal-lizard[Crystal Lizards] go and kill them
steps.1i4yzdnp: Make any thing you need from boss souls with @straid-of-olaphis and @weaponsmith-ornifex
steps.jzsp4cjz: Buy any boss armors you need from @maughlin-the-armorer
steps.bqek1pw8: Buy any NPC armors you need from @merchant-hag-melentia
steps.scq0dppk: Buy any upgrade items you need from @stone-trader-chloanne
steps.sg0vtvas: Upgrade any weapons or armor you need with @blacksmith-lenigrast
steps.hmbme2qg: Infuse any weapons or armor you need with @steady-hand-mcduff
steps.2i1my95l: Incense any spells you need with @magerold-of-lanafir
steps.kh7xmyfq: Buy any consumables you need from the various vendors, like arrows
steps.qwdook3z: Join whatever covenant you want to start the next playthrough as
steps.vk84xcwt: Kill any NPCs you need items from, remembering that sin carries across to NG+, so you may get invaded by @blue-sentinels
steps.koaxpn5v: When you're ready go to the Far Fire bonfire in @majula and do this all again

0sohh643.content: Get through the game once more (you can skip No Man's Wharf, Undead Purgatory and Doors of Pharros), minding four bosses:

steps.agc7524e: @the-lost-sinner drops @old-witch-soul which you can trade with Straid for @flame-weapon pyromancy
steps.dl6c5r7k: @the-duke-s-dear-freja drops @old-paledrake-soul which you can trade with Straid for @crystal-soul-spear sorcery
steps.cpbmyrhh: @old-iron-king drops @old-king-soul which you can trade with Straid for @blinding-bolt miracle
steps.vnn7yrad: @the-rotten drops @old-dead-one-soul which you can trade with Straid for @numbness hex

k3lnczdg.content: Rush to the @drangleic-castle, talk to @chancellor-wellager and buy three remaining spells:

aldia-scholar-of-the-first-sin.defaultName: Aldia, Scholar of the First Sin

crown-of-the-old-iron-king.defaultName: Crown of the Old Iron King

large-soul-of-a-brave-warrior.defaultName: Large Soul of a Brave Warrior

large-soul-of-a-lost-undead.defaultName: Large Soul of a Lost Undead

large-soul-of-a-nameless-soldier.defaultName: Large Soul of a Nameless Soldier
